courses.description:
Are you intrigued by the dynamic world of product management? Do you aspire to lead impactful projects and drive innovation within your organization? Look no further! Our comprehensive Udemy course, "Product Management Essentials: What You Need to Know," is your definitive guide to mastering the essential skills and strategies required for success in this exciting field.


In Lesson 1, you'll dive into the fundamentals with an Introduction to Product Management. Gain a clear understanding of the role of a product manager, explore key responsibilities and skills, and uncover the pivotal role product management plays across various industries through engaging case studies.


Moving on to lesson 2, Essential Skills for Product Managers, you'll hone your communication, problem-solving, and stakeholder management abilities—essential for effective product leadership. Learn how to prioritize tasks and manage time efficiently in the fast-paced world of product management.


lesson 3 delves into the Product Development Lifecycle, providing you with an overview of different methodologies and the crucial role of product managers in each phase. Explore real-world examples of successful product launches and iterations.


In lesson 4, Market Research and Analysis, you'll master the art of gathering and analyzing data to drive informed decision-making. Discover tools and techniques for effective market analysis and competitor research.


Crafting a compelling product vision and strategy takes center stage in Module 5, where you'll learn to develop product roadmaps aligned with business goals and gain buy-in from stakeholders.


lesson 6 and 7 focus on Product Lifecycle Management and Cross-Functional Collaboration, equipping you with strategies for managing products throughout their lifecycle and collaborating effectively with diverse teams.


Finally, in lesson 8, you'll learn to measure product success using key performance indicators (KPIs) and leverage metrics to iterate and improve products continually.


Embark on a journey of discovery and mastery as you navigate through eight comprehensive modules designed to equip you with the essential knowledge and skills needed to excel in the dynamic realm of product management.


In "Product Management Essentials: What You Need to Know," you'll not only gain a solid foundation in the core principles of product management but also learn practical techniques and strategies drawn from real-world examples and case studies.


Throughout the course, you'll be guided by experienced industry professionals who will share their expertise and insights, providing you with actionable advice and best practices that you can apply immediately in your own projects and initiatives.


Whether you're seeking to transition into a career in product management, aiming to enhance your existing skills, or looking to stay updated with the latest trends and methodologies in the field, this course is tailored to meet your needs.


By the end of the course, you'll emerge with a comprehensive understanding of the product management landscape, armed with the tools and knowledge necessary to drive successful product launches, manage product lifecycles, collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, and measure product performance.


Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your product management skills and advance your career. Enroll now and take the first step towards becoming a proficient and influential product manager in today's competitive business environment!


Whether you're a seasoned professional or new to the field, this course provides invaluable insights and practical skills to propel your product management career to new heights. Enroll now and unlock your potential as a product management expert!
target_audience: This course is designed for job seekers and individuals aiming to kickstart their career in product management. It provides practical insights, strategies, and tips to excel in product management job interviews and thrive in the field. With over five years of experience in product management, this course creator will equip you with the essential knowledge and skills required to succeed in this competitive industry.

courses.description:
Success with AI starts not with tools, but with how you think—and how you manage your time. This section combines two foundational skill sets that will empower you to work smarter, not harder, in the AI era.

Then, in the Time Management module, you’ll discover how to align strong productivity habits with AI-powered tools. You’ll learn how to:

You’ll also gain insights into optimizing calendars, managing deep work vs. shallow work, and using personal and team data to reduce burnout, improve performance, and create more intentional routines.

courses.description:
「働き方改革に取り組んでも、社員のモチベーションも生産性もいまいち上がらない・・・」
「社員のエンゲージメントを高め、離職率を下げるためには何をしたら良いのか・・・」


そんなお悩みはありませんか？
実は、生産性やエンゲージメント向上のヒントは、「社員の幸せ」にあるのです！




幸福度の高い社員はそうでない社員に比べ、売上は37%、生産性は31%、創造性は3倍高い、と言われています。
では、私たちは何があると仕事で「幸せ」を感じるのでしょうか？


このコースでは、仕事における幸せは4つの要素「PARW」からできている、とお伝えしています。


P（Purpose＝存在意義）
A（Authenticity=自分らしさ）
R（Relationship=関係性）
W（Wellness=心身の健康）


そして、これら「PARW」に着目し、社員の幸せをデザインするのが、CHO（Chief Happiness Officer）の役割となります。




本コースは、以下の3つのパートから構成されています。


レクチャー：仕事における幸せとは何か？社員が幸せな組織をつくるためには、何をすれば良いか？その考え方をご紹介
ワークショップ：仕事における幸せの重要な要素「Purpose：パーパス」を、ワークショップを通じて見つけていく
ツールボックス：明日から誰でもできる、幸せな組織をつくるツールのご紹介


どのパートから始めていただいても問題ありません！


レクチャーや様々なワークを交えながら、「幸せな組織のつくり方」を身につける80分です。
target_audience: 経営者
管理職・マネジャー

requirements: A Willingness to Learn :)
courses.description:
Would you like to type faster, more accurately, and with confidence? Whether you’re a student, professional, or just looking to boost your productivity, this course will transform your typing skills with practical techniques and 7 proven steps.
In this course, you will learn proper finger placement, posture, and muscle memory techniques to build a strong foundation for efficient typing. We’ll focus on accuracy first, ensuring that you develop good habits before increasing speed.
You'll also explore advanced techniques, including keyboard shortcuts and touch typing to optimize your workflow. Plus, we’ll introduce you to powerful typing software and online tools that will make learning both fun and effective.
Learn proper finger placement by positioning your fingers on the home row keys (ASDF and JKL;) and using your thumbs for the space bar. Each finger has a designated set of keys, which helps with efficiency.
Maintain correct posture by sitting up straight, keeping your feet flat on the floor, and positioning your wrists slightly above the keyboard. Your screen should be at eye level to reduce strain.
Focus on accuracy before speed by typing slowly and correctly. Avoid looking at the keyboard, develop muscle memory, and correct mistakes immediately to prevent bad habits.
Use online typing software such as TypingClub, Keybr, or 10FastFingers to practice with interactive exercises, starting with beginner lessons and progressing gradually.
Increase typing speed gradually by setting comfortable goals and tracking your progress with timed exercises. Consistent practice will help you type faster over time.
Practice regularly with real texts such as emails, articles, or notes instead of random words. Typing games and dictation exercises can make learning more engaging.
Develop advanced typing techniques by learning keyboard shortcuts, mastering touch typing, and experimenting with different keyboard layouts like QWERTY or Dvorak.
With just 10–15 minutes of daily practice, you can significantly boost your typing speed and accuracy. By the end of this course, you'll type effortlessly and efficiently, saving time and enhancing your productivity.
Join now and take the first step toward becoming a pro typist!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn typing from scratch and develop good habits.
Office workers, writers, coders, and anyone who types regularly and wants to boost efficiency.

courses.description:
【あなたは、以下のようなことで悩んでいませんか？】
ビジネスフレームワークを学んでみたけど、なかなか使えていない
日常の仕事をもっと効率的に回していきたい
ロジカルシンキング、論理思考の基本を知りたい
問題解決のための基本事項を押さえて、使えるようになりたい
これらに一つでも当てはまるなら、この講座がオススメです！
たった1時間半で、ビジネスフレームワークの本質と使い方を速習でき、日ごろの仕事ですぐに使っていくことができます！


【PDCA、ロジックツリー、5W1H、空雨傘・・・】
世の中には、たくさんの「ビジネスフレームワーク」があります。
ビジネスフレームワークとは、
タスク管理、ロジカルシンキング（論理思考）、問題解決など、
ビジネスの場面でよく使う仕事や思考の流れを、わかりやすくまとめたものです。
上記の言葉も、誰でも一度は聞いたことがあるかもしれません。


しかし、それらを【実際に使えるか？】というと、疑問が残るのが現状ではないでしょうか。
たとえば・・・
「PDCAを回せ」と言われたけど、何をしたらPDCAを回したことになるかわならない
「5w1h」の内容がわからなくなるし、わかっても使えていない
「空・雨・傘で考えろ」を、具体的に実行する方法がわからない
など、「知ってるけど、実際には使えていない」という場面がビジネスシーンで数多くあります。


【なぜ、ビジネスフレームワークは使いにくいのか？】
それは、多くの場合「概念の説明」だけにとどまり、
「使い方がすぐにイメージできる動作」に落とし込まれていないことが原因です。
この講座では、
誰でも5分で思考がまとまる「『A4一枚』思考整理術」をベースに、
ビジネスフレームワークを日常から使えるようになっていただきます！


【このコースで学べるフレームワーク】
このコースでは、３つのテーマにわけて、７つのフレームワークをマスターすることができます。
■ 日々の仕事、タスク管理、タイムマネジメントに活きるフレームワーク
緊急度・重要度マトリクス
PDCA
■ ロジカルシンキング・プレゼンに活きるフレームワーク
ロジックツリー
5W1H
■ 問題解決・思考整理に活きるフレームワーク
So What? / Why So?
As Is / To Be
空雨傘
また、この過程で、
「MECE、KPT、TOTE、なぜ５回」などの
フレームワークについてもおさえることができます。


ですので、
【あなたがこの講座を見ていただくと、、】
ビジネスフレームワークの本質が理解でき、普段から使えるようになる
日常の仕事に優先順位をつけて、効率よく回していけるようになる
ロジカルに思考し、要点をまとめ、論理的に伝わるプレゼンができるようになる
問題解決のポイントを明確にでき、自分の意見に共感を得られ、行動に移してもらいやすくなる
マッキンゼーでも使うフレームワークを日常で使いこなせるようになる
など、すぐに目の前の仕事に活かすことができます！


ワークを交えていきますので、
紙/ノート
3色のペン（赤・青・緑）
を用意していただくと、より効果があります！


一緒にワークで手を動かしながら、1時間半で、
7つのビジネスフレームワークを使いこなせるようになっていきましょう！

Part 2: Selling Yourself: Speak Like Alexander the Great
Public speaking is one of the most valuable skills you can develop. It’s how leaders inspire, influence, and move people to action. In this section, you’ll master the art of communication, learning how to deliver your message with clarity, confidence, and power.
What You’ll Learn in This Section:
Slowing Down to Command Attention: Speak deliberately and use pauses to make every word count.
Owning Your Body Language: Open your body, drop your shoulders, and use intentional gestures to convey confidence.
Vocal Mastery: Develop a deeper, resonant voice that commands respect.
Removing Filler Words: Replace “um” and “like” with silence to sound polished and professional.
The Art of Storytelling: Engage and inspire your audience by crafting compelling narratives.
Delaying Your Smile: Build mystery and authority with subtle but impactful expressions.
Framing Your Ideas: Learn to speak from your audience’s perspective, connecting with their needs and emotions.
By the End of This Section, You’ll Be Able To:
Deliver speeches and presentations that captivate any audience.
Speak with authority, clarity, and emotional resonance.
Influence and persuade others using proven techniques of great orators.
target_audience: Ambitious people who want to develop their personal brand in the 21st century both offline and more importantly, online.

■コース概要
このコースでは、ChatGPTなどの生成AIを活用して、仕事を効率化するための具体的なプロンプトの書き方を学びます。タスクに合わせたプロンプトのテンプレート化により、日々の業務を半自動化し、時短を実現します。これにより、仕事の質と量が向上し、生産性がUPします。プロンプトの具体例を交えながら、生成AIを使いこなすスキルを身につけましょう。


※無料プレビュー動画『このコースで学べること』や各セクションの『このセクションで学ぶこと』もぜひご覧ください。


■なぜこのコースが必要なのか？

courses.description:
What is Zoho CRM?
Why are so many employers looking for people who have that skill? How do you use it? Is it a technology you would love enough to embark upon a career as a highly paid System Administrator, Consultant, Startup or consolidated business.
Zoho CRM is a powerful cloud plantform and with it you can manage your entire team of sales, emails, documentation, calls, etc and you can integrate it with other Zoho apps and third party platforms through platforms like Zapir or using it advanced API.
Increase Your Sales and your Income With Easy to Follow Training
In this course you will learn the answers to all these questions, and gain the ability to confidently present yourself as someone who knows how to use this popular business tool. If you're already working at a company that has Zoho, you will finally learn how to apply best practices to get the most out of the tool and make your work life easier and perhaps even help you get that raise.
If you're considering a new career that will greatly increase your income and have terrific job security even during recessions, then this course is the foundation you need to be able to master Zoho CRM successfully in your business or others people business, which will train you for both job performance and sales increases. Our company income doubled within just 7 months after we learned how to properly use Zoho CRM. We immediately realized we wanted to specialize in customizing the system, not just using it.
Whatever your situation, this course will give you the opportunity to build competency with a pervasive business technology tool, Zoho CRM.
Other things you should know about this course:
This course was created by Expert Trainers and Zoho Product Managers who deal with hundred of customer every week so that they have an impressive knowledge of the Zoho Ecosystem and Sales Business and it uses Advanced Learning Methodology to guarantee effective learning
This is a very complete non-nonsense course with over 50+ video units summing quality learning time.
Depending on your pace, time and skills it may take you a few days to complete this course if you do the exercises and are only working at it in evenings after work.
The course was created by Zenith Business School, the training business unit from SagitaZ Corporation a 100% Zoho Business oriented international corporation.
We are Zoho Training and implementation experts with over 1000 Zoho implementation projects behind us in over 25 countries.
Around 10 people work for about a year to create this course. Zoho CRM project manageres, developers, creative creators, instructors, etc, so there is an impressive amount of time and expert knowledge injected in this course.
(Google "Zoho formacion" and you will see that we lead the space.) We are also registered Zoho Alliance Partners, Zoho Premium Partners and Consulting Partners, who have trained literally hundreds of new users just like you. We know that no matter how little you know now, you can absolutely learn to use this CRM if you are willing to do the effort.
If you need access to a Zoho CRM to do the exercises in because your current company does not have Zoho, you can sign up for Zoho CRM directly in our SagitaZ website - sagitaz(.)com - completely FREE. If you are considering purchasing Zoho at your company, use this link for a free 30-day trial.
About us: Zenith Business School
We are a professional and business online training company.
Visit our website zenith.school for more information about our postgraduated programms.
We currently offer three university degrees:
Zoho Sales & Marketing
Zoho Creator
Zoho Finance
You can also access these courses, where an official certification is issued, even if you don't have any university training, in which case a "Certificate of Achievement" will be issued.
Visit our website to get more information about our University Training Posgrade Programs and our Software & Consulting Services. We also have an impressive blog where we publish Zoho and Business Development articles on daily basis.
We hope you will enjoy this course and learn a lot in the process, and decide to also take some of our other courses. Be sure to always read our course announcements, so that you don't miss special promotions we offer on other courses, as well as knowing when we add new material to this course.
Note: This course focuses on the brand new Zoho CRM launched in mid 2016 with the brand new user interface, it features dozens of new features that are explained in this course in a step y step manner.
Turn curiosity into a profession by learning what it is, what to do with it, and how to use it successfully.
Ready? Let's go! A great career and bigger Sales are waiting for you.

courses.title: 生産性向上の第一歩！ 時間分析からはじめる数字活用の超基本　～全ての人に取り組んでもらいたい時間資産の可視化
courses.bio: 成果も理想の働き方も時間の使い方がすべて！生産性向上の本質は、時間の使い方を最適化しタイムパフォーマンスを上げることです。最重要資産である時間を数字・データで可視化して、生産性向上や働き方改革を実現。算数レベルのデータ分析を活用します
objectives: 細かい時間管理・タスク管理の前に、時間分析をすることの重要性
時間の使い方を具体的に分析する方法（現状・理想・問題・課題）
時間分析ワークを通して、基本的なデータ分析の流れ・ポイントを体感
特に、分析における比較・仮説・分類の重要性
他人が使う数字に潜む罠を見つける視点
requirements: 特にありませんが、業務で日常的に数字やデータを活用している方は対象外です
courses.description:
「毎日忙しいけど、思ったように仕事の成果が挙がらない」
「数字やデータを使えと言われても、正直しんどい」


多くのビジネスパーソンが一度は抱く本音だと思います。


ビジネスの成果も、人生の幸福度も、時間の使い方がすべてです。
時間は誰にとっても有限で貴重な資産です。
しかし、私たちはそんな貴重な時間の使い方を的確に把握できていません。


現在、何にどれくらい時間をつかっているのか。
理想は、何に・どれくらい時間を使いたいのか。


時間の使い方を、数字やデータで客観的に分析することで、
目標達成のための効率的で効果的なアクションを導くことができます。
生産性を高めることができます。




本講座は、数字やデータが苦手な方でも取り組める、
算数レベルの数字を活用した時間分析・時給分析を行うことで、


・生産性向上の具体的アクションを見つけること
・数字やデータ活用の効能を体感すること


を同時に実現することを目指しています。


全体で約１２０分、１．５倍速で９０分程度のコンパクトな講座なので、
ぜひ気軽な気持ちでご視聴ください！
target_audience: タイムパフォーマンスや生産性を高めたいすべてのビジネスパーソン（新人・中堅・ベテラン）
忙しい割には、思うような成果を出せておらず、自身の生産性やタイムマネジメントに課題感がある方
生産性向上のために、データや数字活用の必要性は理解しているが、 数字を使ったPDCAが習慣化していない方
数字が好きではなく、今でも 本音は数字やデータ活用は避けたい方

courses.bio: Master AI-driven business models, marketing, productivity, and ethical practices for entrepreneurial success.

The Evolution of Business with AI: Marketing Automation - More than just tools
AI Tools for Entrepreneurs: Using AI to Increase Workplace Efficiency
Enhancing Personal Productivity with AI Tools

requirements: Basic understanding of entrepreneurship or business.
Access to a computer and internet connection.
Familiarity with digital marketing concepts.
Willingness to learn AI applications in business.
No prior AI experience required.
Interest in enhancing business productivity with AI.
Basic knowledge of social media platforms.
Commitment to completing hands-on projects.
Curiosity about AI ethics and data privacy.
Desire to innovate and drive business growth.
courses.description:
Welcome to "AI Entrepreneurship: Unlocking Opportunities with Generative AI," your comprehensive guide to harnessing the power of artificial intelligence in the world of entrepreneurship. In today’s rapidly evolving business landscape, integrating AI can provide a significant competitive edge, transforming how entrepreneurs build, manage, and scale their ventures. This course is meticulously designed for aspiring entrepreneurs, startup founders, business professionals, and innovators eager to leverage Generative AI to drive business success.
Throughout this course, you will explore the foundational concepts of AI in entrepreneurship, starting with an introduction to ChatGPT and its extensive capabilities. Learn how self-guided learning with AI can enhance your business strategies and decision-making processes. Dive into the evolution of business with AI, understanding how marketing automation goes beyond mere tools to create meaningful customer interactions.
Discover a suite of AI tools tailored for entrepreneurs, from social media toolkits to AI-driven email assistants, designed to increase workplace efficiency and personal productivity. Explore AI-driven business models, identifying opportunities where AI can create value propositions and transform traditional business practices. Through real-world case studies, gain insights into successful AI integrations that have propelled businesses to new heights.
Enhance your marketing and sales efforts by redefining content creation with AI, using ChatGPT as your idea engine to craft engaging and effective marketing campaigns. Learn the art of automation with empathy, personalizing customer interactions at scale and entering the age of hyper-personalization to meet diverse customer needs.
Addressing ethical considerations is crucial in AI-driven entrepreneurship. This course covers the ethical implications of using AI in business, ensuring your practices are responsible and reliable. Stay ahead by exploring future trends in AI for e-commerce and content marketing automation, preparing you for upcoming advancements in the industry.
Engage in practical workshops where you will develop business plans and pitch AI-driven ideas, applying the knowledge gained to real-world entrepreneurial scenarios. By the end of this course, you will be equipped with the skills and strategies to transform your entrepreneurial ventures with Generative AI, driving innovation, efficiency, and sustainable growth. Join us and unlock the full potential of AI in your entrepreneurial journey!
target_audience: Aspiring Entrepreneurs: Launch and grow your business with AI tools.
Startup Founders: Optimize your startup operations using Generative AI.
Business Professionals: Enhance your business strategies with AI insights.
Innovators: Integrate AI into your innovative projects and ideas.
Digital Marketers: Create AI-driven marketing campaigns that convert.
Productivity Enthusiasts: Boost personal and workplace efficiency with AI.
Tech-Savvy Individuals: Explore cutting-edge AI applications in business.
Students & Educators: Learn AI tools to support entrepreneurial education.
Business Consultants: Offer AI-driven solutions to your clients.
Anyone Interested in AI Entrepreneurship: Upskill and advance your entrepreneurial journey.

courses.description:
Welcome to "AI Marketing Mastery: Leverage ChatGPT & Automation," your comprehensive guide to transforming your marketing strategies with artificial intelligence. In today's rapidly evolving digital landscape, staying ahead means embracing cutting-edge technologies that drive efficiency and personalization. This course is meticulously designed for marketing professionals, digital marketers, content creators, and business owners who aspire to harness the power of AI to elevate their marketing efforts.
Throughout this course, you will delve into the foundational concepts of AI in marketing, exploring how tools like ChatGPT can revolutionize content creation and customer engagement. Learn to implement AI-driven marketing automation to streamline your campaigns, allowing for more targeted and effective outreach. courses.title: 「段取りのキホン」の著者が語るタイムマネジメント！オフィス＆在宅での時間管理（リピート9割超の人気研修をWeb化）
courses.bio: 著者累計36万部。段取りのプロが語るタイムマネジメント。「書類やメールがたまってしまう」「いつも余裕がない」…今、この瞬間から使える時間管理、業務効率化のコツを2時間の講座の中に詰め込みました。
objectives: 仕事の「ムリ・ムダ・ムラ」をなくし、効率的に仕事を進める具体策が分かります
「スキマ時間」を有効に使って、手際よく業務を片付ける方法が分かります
オンタイムで貫徹するスケジューリングのコツが分かります
資料作成、メール送信などのPC作業を最速で済ませる方法が分かります
打ち合わせを短縮化する方法が分かります

オフィスと在宅の違い: ウォーミングアップ：９つの点ゲーム
在宅での集中力を高める環境設定
集中力を高めるテクニック
ムダ・ムリ・ムラをなくす: 隠れたムダを見つける
やり直しを予防する（ムダをなくす）
移動距離を最短化させる（アポイントの取り方）
出来栄えにこだわらない
締め切り前、月末の繁忙を緩和する
特急仕事を増やさない（納期交渉）
上手い断り方を知る（ムダを増やさない）
スキマ時間の有効活用: ・スキマ時間をつくる　・スキマ時間でやることのリストアップ
スケジューリングのコツ: 先に終わりから決める（逆算で考える）
資料作成の短縮化: 「単語登録機能・文章登録機能」をフル活用する
メールは、音声で入力する
やりとりの「回数」を増やさない
打ち合わせ・会議: 打ち合わせ、ミーティングを短縮化させる
オンライン会議を効果的な場にする
おわりに: ボーナスレクチャー：追加情報

requirements: 特にありません。
courses.description:
あなたはこれまでに「最短の時間で結果を出す」タイムマネジメントのメソッドに出会ったことはありますか？


実は、それほど難しいものではありません。スグにできることばかりです。
私自身、新人の頃は残業でヘトヘトになる、そんな日常でした。
でも、タイムマネジメントのメソッドを実践したことで、その後は残業をすることなく、
確実に成果を出すことができるようになりました。
やってみて思うことは、タイムマネジメントはやってみると意外と簡単、ということでした。


もちろん、時短、時間管理の本も読んでいましたし先輩からも教わっていましたが、
時間管理の方法を「知る」だけでは何も変わることはありませんでした。やはり、「実践」してこそです。
この講座で紹介するタイムマネジメントのメソッドは、明日からでもスグにできることばかり。


全部をやる必要はありません。
今のあなたに必要だと思われる点だけを集中的に、ただし確実に実践することをお勧めします。


日本のリーディングカンパニーを中心に、年間200回、リピート率9割超の研修を提供しており
タイムマネジメントのベストセラー「段取りのキホン」「手帳・メモのキホン」「絶対に残業しない時短のワザ」の著者でもある、
人気研修トレーナー、伊庭正康が本講座を皆さんにお届けします。
たった２時間で学べるので、忙しいビジネスマンでも受けやすい講座になっています！


〔講座内容〕
● 邪魔や誘惑の多いリモートワークでも、集中力を維持する方法
● ムダ・ムリ・ムラをなくす方法（ムダに気づく４つの質問）
● スキマ時間の有効活用（１分のムダも有効活用する）
● スケジューリングのコツ（大事なことを先延ばししないコツ）
● 資料作成の短縮化（文書作成の早業、メール返信の早業　※人によっては１０倍速になる）
● 革命的に入力が速くなっる音声入力をフル活用する方法
● 打ち合わせ・会議（オンライン会議のコツも含めて）


など、実践セオリーを紹介します。
ワークも用意していますので、学ぶだけではなく、実践に活かしていただけるプログラムです。
target_audience: 気が付けばつい残業してしまっている人
在宅ワークになり、仕事に集中するのが難しい人
そもそもどんな業務が無駄なのか分かっていない人
いつも急ぎの仕事でバタバタしてしまう人
メールや文章の作成に時間がかかってしまう人
打ち合わせ・会議の時間を効率的に済ませたいと思っている人
時短しつつも仕事の成果を上げたい人

courses.bio: Text editing with ease

Getting Started: Working with Text and Using Undo
Creating New File and using New Window
Saving in Various Formats: Saving file as different document formats

requirements: Basic Computer Knowledge
courses.description:
Notepad is a default text editing tool that comes pre-installed with Windows Computers. This course has been made with Notepad for Windows 11 but is applicable for other versions of notepad as well.
In this course, we are going to start off with learning about the interface of Notepad and explore out different options such as working with text, saving text files, opening notepad files, and creating new notepad files.
We will then explore different features for text editing such as cut, copy, paste and delete option, changing of reading order, find option, replace option, word wrap, go to option, select all option, font settings, date and time and zoom options which will let is manage out the texts in the way we want to.
We will then also see how we can make files in notepad to save it out in different formats such as an HTML document, a CMD file, a SRT file and document formats.
After that, we will see the software settings such allows us to access and hide the status bar, change the app theme and encoding options.
And then, we will see the exporting and printing options of the application and then finally wrap up the course with an example project.
Notepad is a simple yet powerful text editing tool and in this course we are going to take a look at what it is capable of.
target_audience: Beginners

courses.title: Introduction to Digital Media
courses.bio: Understanding Human Behavior, Media Management, and Social Media Law

Social Media, Privacy, and the Law: U.S. Law and Freedom of Speech
U.S. Law, Social Media, and Data Privacy

requirements: There are no prerequisite courses
courses.description:
This is the perfect introductory course for those looking to understand the world of digital media. User experience design is much more than creating interfaces; it’s a multidisciplinary approach to shaping how individuals engage with digital social media. Human psychology plays a crucial role in these interactions, especially in fostering a sense of "agency" — the confidence that users can effectively achieve their goals within the network. Equally important is understanding how social media platforms are shaped by the evolving legal and regulatory landscape, including data privacy laws, ethical standards, concerns about misinformation, and the influence of algorithmic bias. These forces significantly affect how people behave online and how platforms design user experiences.


In this course, participants will explore the intersection of social media design, user experience, and human behavior, gaining comprehensive knowledge to manage content development and steer future technologies. Students will delve into how design choices impact user engagement, affect societal trends, and drive important discussions around platform accountability and user trust. They will also gain a deeper understanding of the balance between user autonomy and platform control.


Rather than focusing on any specific tools or software, the course offers a holistic perspective on how digital social media environments shape human behavior, providing participants with strategic insights and a framework to navigate the complexities of the digital world.
target_audience: Managers, beginner user experience designers, software engineers seeking a broad understanding of user experience design from a human psychology

courses.title: Cyber Criminals Want Your Information: Stop Them Cold!
courses.bio: Learn to securely and easily manage your digital life's ever growing list of passwords and beat the cyber criminals!
requirements: You should have basic Internet and computer skills which you have because you made it to Udemy!
Turn on HD (high definition) on the Udemy player so the videos are clear and sharp!
courses.description:
Let's face it - life on the Internet means usernames and passwords (accounts)! Lots of them in fact!
Stop and think about it for a moment.  How many sites do you login into daily, weekly, or monthly?
Social media: Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, Skype, Pinterest, Instragram, Youtube...
Ecommerce: Amazon, eBay, Overstock, Newegg, Target, Walmart...
Online Banking: Paypal, Bank Of America, Wells Fargo, Sun Trust, Charles Schwab...
Email: Gmail, Yahoo! Mail, Hotmail, your ISP email...
Gaming: Xbox Live!, Playstation, Wii, Steam....
Streaming: Youtube, Netflix, Hulu, Curiosity Stream...
The above list is only a small sample of sites you probably use on a regular basis.  In fact many people have over one hundred accounts and that list is growing all the time!
How do you keep track of all this information?
Use the same few passwords among your accounts
Keep a spreadsheet
Write them down on paper
List them on a word processing document
Stick notes on your monitor
Unfortunately none of those are good practices.  That's right - none of them.  For the best security you should have a different password for every account (site)!  These passwords should also be stored in an encrypted and safe manner.
Now why should you use a different password? You have heard of massive data breaches haven't you? Where cyber criminals steal thousands, hundreds of thousands, or even millions of account information?  It has happened to many sites including Adobe, eBay, Twitter, and many many others.
If your Twitter and bank passwords are the same and the cyber criminals steal your Twitter password, guess what? They could now potentially access your bank account! That would be a nightmare.
So every account on every site should have a unique password.  After all, the username is usually your email address so in most cases your account is only protected by your password.  However, there is more to this puzzle.
You should make your password as difficult for the cyber criminals to guess as possible.  That means quit using video123 and use something like R-'hJ@y|11_b@i&U%RfB-z`J7ZF0d":blJg"ksUg which is far more secure.
Now you are probably wondering: how in the world do I have a unique long password for every site and easily keep track of all this information? Well, you are in the right place.  That is the whole point of this Udemy course.
Your instructor, Jeremy O'Connell, will explain with videos how you secure your digital accounts and better protect yourself from cyber criminals.  So the next time when you hear on the news   of some site being hacked and millions of accounts being stolen you will know your accounts are safe and changing that site's password is no big deal.
What are you waiting for?! This course is even free, so put away your wallet!
target_audience: If you are viewing this page you are using the Internet and it is time to learn how to better protect your online accounts from cyber criminals.

courses.description:

Scrivener is by far the best writer's software on the market, for many reasons.
In this short information packed hour long presentation, author, coach and Scrivener expert, David Lee Martin, will take you on a whistlestop tour of some of the best features for hard working writers, self-publishers, and content creators, just like you.
Join right now and discover how Scrivener can lift your writing, publishing and productivity to new levels.
The 'Get Started With Scrivener' course is a completely newbie friendly guide taken from a webinar I ran introducing people to some of the powerful features and benefits of the Scrivener software.
In the included eBook both this, and another webinar, are also included in full. The content of these popular webinars has been used and adapted for these excellent and useful introductory courses on Udemy.
Using the webinar I occasionally refer to my more complete training guides that are both available here on Udemy, but the content of this free course is still highly valuable and actionable in it's own right. I am sure you will love every minute of this action packed overview of this incredible software.
This particular course uses the Mac version of Scrivener, but the content and training is relevant to both the Mac and Windows version of the software.
Some of the areas covered in the training, and the free eBook you will revceive include:
1: Meet Scrivener
A whirlwind tour of the Scrivener writing environment. Surprisingly easy once you are familiar with it all.
2: Easy Ways To Get Your Content Into Scrivener
There are many ways to get content into Scrivener, in this lesson we highlight three of the quickest and easiest.
3: Become a Scrivener Formatting Superstar
A tour of Scrivener's excellent text formatting capabilities.
4: Get To Know The Scrivener Corkboard
The corkboard is an amazing place to brainstorm and arrange your ideas. This is a really helpful lesson to have under your Scrivener belt.
5: The Scrivener Research Folder
The Research folder can hold pretty much anything your throw at it. Learn a few tricks in this lesson and supercharge your research collection and organization.
6: Organizing Your Scrivener Binder
Once your documents are safely inside the Scrivener project file, you have the ability to move them around, rearrange, merge and group, and so much more. This lesson introduces some of these amazing organization and productivity boosting benefits.
7: An Introduction To The Compiler
The powerhouse engine of Scrivener is the compiler - the ability to take one manuscript and output it for pretty much any platform, whether it be digital, print or web. This introduction removes the mystery, and opens up the hood for you to see and feel its power for your own projects.
8: Compile For Kindle Using Scrivener
One of the most popular features of Scrivener is its ability to output a perfect Kindle ready file in just a few clicks. I show you exactly how to do this with a detailed video webinar walkthrough from beginning to end.
9: Distraction Free Writing
And back to where it all happens - YOUR WRITING! Scrivener may be packed with other amazing possibilities, but it all comes back to this, and Scrivener does not disappoint. The distraction free writing mode makes crafting your written content a delight.
10: Wrapping It Up
A quick wrap up and encouragement to take what you have just learned, and put it to immediate use in your own writing life. Best of luck!
**********************************************
Includes Free 52 Page Ebook, 'Get Started With Scrivener'
**********************************************
Written especially for people who are completely new to Scrivener, the Get Started With Scrivener ebook is a fast track eCourse to learn the basics of Scrivener and make it really go to work for you in your writing projects. バックオフィス業務を効率化したいなら、コスト・汎用性・難易度・処理速度等の観点から総合的に見て、Excel VBA(マクロ)やRPAより断然Pythonをオススメします！




"必要十分なスキルを身につける"。これが本コースの大きなコンセプトの１つです。
世の中のプログラミング教材は、プログラミング初学者、特に「エンジニアを目指しているわけではないけれど、プログラミングに興味がある、自業務・実生活にプログラミングを活用してみたい」ぐらいで考えておられる方にとってはあまりにも過剰な知識を含んでおり、かつ基礎文法の解説ばかりで結局Pythonが自分にどのように役立つのかよく分からない、という場合が多いです。
知識が網羅されており大ボリュームな教材は、必ずしも初学者にとって最適なものではなく、むしろ"挫折の可能性を高めてしまうというデメリットの方が遥かに大きい"と私は考えております。せっかく興味を持って学び始めたのに必須ではない知識の勉強が原因で挫折してしまう、というのは極めてもったいないですし、残念ながら実際よくあることです。
なぜこのようなことが頻発してしまうかと申しますと、理由は大きく分けて２点あります。
１点目は、"ほとんどのプログラミング教材が現役エンジニアやエンジニア経験者によって作成されており、本当の初学者・独学者の気持ちやニーズが理解されていない"からです。２点目に、学習者に非は無く不可避な話ではあるのですが、"初学者であるが故に、どの知識が過剰なものなのか判別できない"からなのです。


本コースは、自身の独学経験も生かして、初学者の方が挫折せずにプログラミングの力と楽しさを実感していただけるような内容・ボリュームを意識して作成しました。言うならば、「こんな教材があったら良かったのに」「独学時代の自分に届けたい」と思える教材にしております。
プログラミング教材でありがちな「とにかく教材を最後までこなすことが目的化してしまい、よく分からないまま写経してスキルアップした気になっただけで終わり」になってしまわないような工夫もしております。
また、他の多くのUdemyコースが質問回答や内容更新が無いまま放置されている中、私のコースでは、ルールに則ったうえで頂いたご質問には真摯に対応するとともに、皆様からのフィードバックを受け随時レクチャーの更新もしております。
詳しいカリキュラムについては本ページ内の「コースの内容」欄をご確認ください。




プログラミングは決して限られた人にしか扱えないものではありません。年齢も文系理系も関係ありません。
誰にでも門戸は開かれており、あなたも必ずプログラムが書けるようになります。
スマホのアプリを使うのと同じように、気楽に楽しみましょう。


完璧である必要は全くなく、ハイレベルを目指す必要もありません。
大谷翔平でなくても野球をして良いし、楽しむことができますよね。それと同じです。
ただあなたの日々の仕事や生活に、あなたのできる範囲でプログラミングを活用し、今より少しでも充実した日々になる。それで十分なのです。


プログラミングを習得すれば、
できる仕事の範囲が広がる・業務効率化により可処分時間が増える
↓
自分でコントロールできる仕事（裁量権）が増える・ストレスが減る
↓
会社生活・私生活がもっと充実する
という好循環に入ることができます。




「仕事が忙しくて勉強する時間が無い…」という方もたくさんいらっしゃると思います。私も以前は会社員でしたから、働きながら自己研鑽をする大変さは良く分かります。
しかし、その忙しい現状を打破するためにこそ、忙しい合間を縫ってでも今、業務効率化スキルを学ぶべきなのです。少し厳しく聞こえるかもしれませんが、日々愚痴をこぼしながらも目の前のタスクを盲目的にこなし、勉強できない言い訳をしているだけでは、残念ながら状況は何も変わりません。
またよくありがちな落とし穴は、せっかく勉強にリソースを割いているのに"概論的な勉強"ばかりしてしまうことです。DX・BPR・EBPM…この界隈にはそれっぽいカッコイイ言葉が並びますが、（やらされ感を半分持ちながらも）そういった類の入門講座ばかりをむやみに受講し、言葉の定義を字面だけ暗記し、付け焼き刃の勉強で資格を取得し、なんとなく成長した気になったとしても…果たして実際に目の前の仕事は何か変えられていますか？
楽は苦の種、苦は楽の種。是非「自分の力で自分の時間を作り出すんだ！」という気概を持って、毎日少しずつでもいいので"目の前の仕事を効率化するための勉強"に時間を割いてみていただければと思います。業務効率化は"やったもん勝ち"。習得が早ければ早いほど、恩恵は大きくなります。


是非この機会に、私と一緒に楽しみながらリスキリングを始めましょう！
それでは、コースでお会いできることを楽しみにしております。






★学習効率を最大化するための講師推奨ラーニングパス★
①本コース
（Python・プログラミングの基礎を学び、プログラムによってどんなことが実現できるのかを知る）
↓

（基礎力を鍛え上げて自信をつけ、プログラミングの面白さを再確認し、学習のモチベーションをさらに上げる）
↓
③応用編・Excel自動化編・Windows編のうちニーズに合ったコース

Did you know that you can host a website on GitHub Pages for free?
And this course will give you a step-by-step guidance on how to host a website for free using GitHub Pages.
Now, before even having a second thought on having a website online or getting into the Basics of GitHub Pages, Lets read a few benefits of having a website online.
Did you know the Benefits of having a website online?
Having a Website is Far Cheaper than Advertising.
Promotes your Business 24*7 and 365 Days
Adds Value to everything (Customers, Services, Products)
Improves Credibility
Brings Growth Opportunity
Inexpensive way to provide information about your Business to your Customers.
A Website makes it easy for people to refer new customers to you.
A Website is a powerful sales tool
Now, let's talk about GitHub Pages and why you would want to use it for hosting your websites online.
GitHub Pages are public webpages freely hosted and easily published through the GitHub website. You can create and publish them online using the Automatic Page Generator. If you prefer to work locally, you can use the GitHub for Mac and Windows apps.
In this course you'll learn how to host your website using GitHub Pages. Before diving into GitHub Pages, You'll need to purchase your own Domain Name which costs around $10 to $12 yearly that's it no more expenses.
A lot of people who are scared to get their First Website online now can have their website online right away using GitHub Pages.
In this course you'll learn the following things:
Getting Started with GitHub
How to create Repositories and Organizations
How to use GitHub Pages
Types of GitHub Pages
How to use the Git Extensions Software
How to Host Websites using GitHub Pages

People with New Business who might need to host a Website
People running Organizations
People who need to host Charity Websites
People who need to host Community Websites
Web Developers

courses.description:
Coping & Moving Forward After a Layoff at Your Organization
Recover from Being Laid Off: Emotional Healing, Team Rebuilding & Workplace Resilience
Have you or your team been impacted by a recent layoff? Whether you’ve had a layoff yourself, grappling with emotional fallout or a leader striving to rebuild team morale, this course provides the emotional support and practical strategies you need to move forward with clarity and confidence.
What You’ll Learn:
Understand the emotional and psychological effects of layoffs on employees who have left and who remain.
Recognize and address survivor’s guilt, workplace anxiety, and morale loss.
Apply stress management techniques to regain emotional balance.
Navigate organizational change with resilience and adaptability.
Cultivate a supportive team culture during and after restructuring.
Learn leadership strategies for boosting morale and promoting mental well-being.
Encourage continuous improvement and rebuild trust within your team.
Why Take This Course?
Layoffs don’t just affect those who leave. The "layoff survivors" often struggle in silence—overwhelmed by guilt, uncertainty, and fear of the unknown. This course is designed to equip professionals, managers, and HR teams with the tools to heal emotionally, rebuild workplace culture, and thrive in the new normal.
Whether you're feeling the emotional strain or leading others through it, this course gives you actionable insights to:
Reduce burnout and emotional fatigue
Reignite purpose and motivation in the workplace
Rebuild trust and collaboration across teams
Promote psychological safety and emotional intelligence
Develop a forward-focused mindset to thrive in times of change
Who Is This Course For?
Employees that were let go as well as those who remain after a company layoff and are struggling to adjust
HR professionals supporting teams through post-layoff transitions
Leaders and managers responsible for maintaining morale and performance
Anyone experiencing emotional distress due to workplace instability
Course Includes:
Practical tools for emotional recovery and team re-engagement
Thought meditations on how you're feeling
Real-world scenarios and reflective prompts
Lifetime access + Certificate of Completion

courses.bio: 最後まで何が決まったのかわからなかった・・。そんなグダグダ会議はもうたくさん！ベストセラー書籍『世界で一番やさしい会議の教科書』の著者・榊巻亮が超初心者向けにグダグダ会議撲滅のためのコツを伝授します。
objectives: なぜ会議が重要なのかを認識する
会議を変えるための基本動作１：決まったこと、やるべきことを確認する

はじめに: 自己紹介、本日お伝えしたいこと
a)なぜ会議が重要なのか: 生涯会議時間、会議で何を考えている？
会議参加者はどんな状態、一般的な会議、良い会議
b）会議を変える基本動作: 基本動作をおさえる　簡単なことからしっかりやろう
決まったこと、やるべきことの確認　若手のメモより
終了条件と進め方の確認　会議の目的の設定、目的→終了条件
演習: 演習１：こんな状況でどうする
演習２：こんな状況でどうする
こんなのはNG、終了条件が「？」なときはこうする
議論を可視化する: 議論を可視化する　「書く」ことの重要性
オンラインと対面会議
c）会議を変えるコツを浸透させる: 会議を変えるコツの浸透①～③
まとめ: 【受講者特典】講義資料のPDF・全68ページをダウンロードする

requirements: 「会議」「打ち合わせ」をしたことがある人
仕事やプライベートで「打ち合わせ」をする必要がある人
courses.description:
あなたの参加する会議は有意義なものですか？
このコースでは会議を変えるための「最初の一手」を学ぶことができます。


一説によるとホワイトカラーの人が一生涯で会議に費やす時間は「3万時間」と言われています。
一日10時間活動できるとして、なんと約8年もの膨大な時間になります。
せっかく貴重な人生の時間を8年分も会議に捧げるのであれば、「生産的で有意義な会議」にしたいと思いませんか？


実は会議には高いスキルや才能は必要ないのです。
必要なのは「始め方のコツ」のみ。
これさえ押さえればあなたの参加する会議は確実に変わります。


明日から使える、使いたくてウズウズする、そんな「コツ」を分かりやすく丁寧に解説します。


※本コースでは、会議の主催者でなくても会議を有意義で生産性の高いものにするための「コツ」をご紹介します。以下のようなお話はしませんので予めご了承ください。


会議の準備の仕方
フレームワークを使った会議の運営方法
参加者全員から意見を引き出す方法
参加者に対話を促し、合意形成をする方法
議論のまとめ方

courses.title: 残業なしで成果を出す！1.5時間で学ぶマネージャーのための時間管理術【中間管理職のスケジュール管理講座】
courses.bio: 「中間管理職は残業が多い」そう諦めていませんか？実務経験豊かな現役執行役員が管理職の時間管理のコツを伝授。人手不足、上司部下に振り回される、そんな環境でも残業せずに成果を出す。タスク管理・ツールの選び方など明日から実務で使えるコツが満載！
objectives: 中間管理職の陥りがちなシチュエーションを踏まえて、残業が増える要因が整理できる

はじめに: 講師の自己紹介・時間管理の講座を作った理由
この講座の対象者と学べること
残業が増える原因をあぶりだす: スケジュール管理で困っている事を洗い出してみよう

役割のあいまいさを無くすことで無駄を減らす

スケジュールが入っていない時間の過ごし方に課題はないか

全スライドのダウンロード: PDFファイルのダウンロード

requirements: 一個人としてのスケジュール管理ではなく、部下や後輩などと協業する対象がいる方向けの内容です
courses.description:
管理職やマネージャー職は「残業が多い」ものと思っていませんか。毎日、バタバタして上司や部下に振り回されて疲弊している管理職。大量の仕事を抱えて部下に依頼する余裕すらない。もしくは、部下に丸投げして早く帰宅する上司のようにはなりたくない、そんな想いで、部下の仕事まで拾ってしまう責任感の強いマネージャーの方もいるかもしれません。こうした様子を見て「管理職になりたくない」と思う方が増えているのが現実です。


とはいえ、部下の育成や支援にも手を抜かず、大量のタスクをこなしながら、しっかり成果を出すのは不可能なことではありません。私は管理職のビジネススキルを長い間をかけて磨くことで、年間20営業日（1か月相当）の有給休暇を取れる状態に至りました。一方で、部下を支援し、成長と活躍の場を提供すること心がけていますので、配下のメンバーの従業員満足度は非常に高い状態を保っています。その経験から編み出したコツを、現場で真摯に強い責任感をもって実務を支えている管理職の皆さんや、将来の管理職候補の方にお伝えしたいと思っています。


なぜなら、部下に丸投げをせず、チームの力を使って成果を出せるリーダーが増えれば、チームメンバーのやりがいが高まり、事業の業績も上がっていきます。それにより、回りまわって社会が良くなると思っているからです。そのためには、性別や家庭環境などの事情に関わらず、やる気のあるリーダー候補の方がマネージャー職を担えるようになる必要があります。そのためには時間効率を高めることは必須の要素と考えています。


加えて「女性管理職を増やしたい」という想いもこの講座を作った背景にあります。残業が多く自分のペースを守れない管理職という役割は、家庭生活との両立を重視したいライスステージを考えると、難易度が高く感じるかもしれません。ただ、自分自身の仕事のやり方を変えたり、周囲との協業の仕方を改善することで、ワークライフバランスを保ちつつ、管理職として成果を出すことは可能です。女性に限らず、ワークライフバランスを大事にしたい環境にいる方に、ぜひご覧になっていただきたいと思います。次世代をになうリーダーとなる皆さんの日々の業務の効率化だけでなく、その先のキャリアの選択肢を広げることに、少しでも貢献できれば幸いです。
target_audience: 部下がいる中間管理職や、管理職候補。プレイングマネージャーから卒業したい人
後輩の指導をしながら自分もプレイヤーの役割を担っている人
将来、管理職を目指しているが、残業が多そうなのでためらっている人

courses.description:
Are you struggling to get the results you want from AI tools like ChatGPT or Gemini? Do you often receive generic answers, experience AI hallucinations, or feel overwhelmed by how to integrate AI into your workflow? If you're ready to move beyond basic questions and truly command AI, you've come to the right place.


Prompt Mastery is your essential guide to effectively commanding Gen AI for any task, from simple queries to complex AI agent pipelines. This course is designed to transform the way you interact with AI, helping you understand how prompts fundamentally shape AI outputs.


At the heart of this course is the powerful and practical MASTER technique, a framework developed from real-world experience that you can apply to any LLM provider.


You will master:
M - Main Part: Learn to craft the core components of any effective prompt.
A - Acting: Instruct the AI to adopt a specific persona or role for more tailored responses.
S - Structure: Define the exact format and organization you need for the AI's output.
T - Thought (Chain of Thought): Guide the AI through a logical reasoning process to tackle complex problems.
E - Examples (N-shot Learning): Provide concrete examples to the AI to ensure the output matches your desired style and content.
R - Reflection: Learn techniques to have the AI review and refine its own work for superior quality.


Beyond the MASTER framework, you will also explore advanced concepts like multimodal prompting (working with both text and images) and learn a systematic approach to testing and refining your prompts to ensure consistent, high-quality results.


The course is packed with 10 real-world use cases that demonstrate how to apply the MASTER technique in practical scenarios. By the end of this course, you will be able to confidently design clear, structured, and context-rich prompts that enhance your productivity, creativity, and insight in any real-world task.


Stop getting frustrated with AI and start getting the results you need. Enroll in Prompt Mastery today and learn to command AI effectively!


What you'll learn
A deep understanding of what prompts are and why they are critical for shaping AI outputs.
The exclusive MASTER framework to systematically build effective prompts.
How to create prompts that are clear, structured, and rich with context for better results.
Techniques for multimodal prompting, using both text and images.
A process for testing and refining your prompts to achieve consistency and quality.
How to command AI to boost your productivity, creativity, and insight in real-world applications.
Best practices drawn from the real-world experience of experts.


Who this course is for:
Anyone who wants to get better, more reliable results from AI tools.
Professionals, educators, and AI enthusiasts eager to learn the best practices for commanding AI.
Developers who are beginning to build agentic AI applications.
The general public interested in leveling up their AI skills.

courses.description:
The Microsoft Windows Server Hybrid Administrator Associate certification is a credential designed for IT professionals who manage core Windows Server workloads and services using both on-premises and cloud technologies. As organizations increasingly adopt hybrid infrastructures, this certification validates the skills required to seamlessly integrate and manage Windows Server environments across traditional data centers and Microsoft Azure.
The certification primarily focuses on the administration of Windows Server in hybrid settings, reflecting the modern demands of IT operations. It covers various responsibilities, including managing identity and security, implementing and managing hybrid networking, and performing backup and disaster recovery using Azure services. Professionals are expected to demonstrate proficiency in core infrastructure management, such as virtualization, storage, and monitoring, while also showcasing expertise in hybrid capabilities like Azure Arc and Azure Stack HCI.
This certification is ideal for system administrators who want to expand their expertise into cloud-based services while maintaining robust on-premises solutions. It also prepares professionals to contribute to digital transformation efforts within their organizations by bridging the gap between traditional IT infrastructure and modern cloud capabilities. It also aligns with Microsoft’s broader vision of enabling flexible, scalable, and secure IT environments through hybrid cloud strategies. With an increasing number of companies adopting hybrid solutions, the skills validated by this certification are highly relevant and in demand.

requirements: Basic Knowledge of Problem-Solving Techniques

courses.description:
This course provides a comprehensive overview of two powerful problem-solving methodologies used in quality management: 8D (Eight Disciplines) and QRQC (Quick Response Quality Control). The course is designed for professionals involved in quality assurance, operations, manufacturing, and process improvement, aiming to equip them with the tools and techniques needed to resolve complex problems effectively and prevent recurrence.
8D Problem Solving is a structured, team-based approach that focuses on identifying root causes of problems, implementing corrective actions, and ensuring long-term improvements. Participants will learn how to apply this methodology to resolve quality issues, optimize processes, and drive continuous improvement within their organizations.
QRQC (Quick Response Quality Control) is a fast-paced problem-solving approach that emphasizes immediate containment and quick corrective actions to minimize defects and disruptions in production. Participants will learn how to implement QRQC tools to rapidly address quality issues, contain defects, and ensure immediate recovery in high-pressure environments.
Throughout this course, participants will explore practical problem-solving tools such as the 5 Whys, Fishbone Diagram, Pareto Analysis, and Control Charts, gaining hands-on experience in identifying root causes, developing effective solutions, and ensuring sustainable quality improvements.
By the end of the course, participants will be equipped to:
Lead or contribute to cross-functional teams in solving complex quality problems using the 8D methodology.
Apply QRQC tools to quickly respond to and resolve quality issues in manufacturing or production settings.
Develop and implement permanent corrective actions to prevent recurring issues.
Foster a culture of continuous improvement by integrating both 8D and QRQC strategies within their organizations.
target_audience: Quality Assurance (QA) and Quality Control (QC) Professionals
Manufacturing and Production Managers
Engineering Teams (Process, Production, or Design Engineers)
Project Managers

courses.description:
In a world facing pressing environmental challenges, the need for sustainable living has never been more critical. Our course, "Renew Sustainability: Nurturing a Greener Tomorrow," is your gateway to understanding and actively participating in the global movement towards a more sustainable and eco-friendly future. Whether you're a concerned citizen, an aspiring environmental advocate, or a professional seeking to make a positive impact, this course will empower you to effect meaningful change.

Course Benefits:

1. Sustainability Knowledge: Gain a comprehensive understanding of sustainability principles, concepts, and practices. Explore topics such as renewable energy, eco-friendly design, waste reduction, and sustainable agriculture.

2. Environmental Awareness: Dive into critical environmental issues, including climate change, biodiversity loss, and resource depletion. Understand the root causes and consequences of these challenges.

3. Practical Skills: Acquire tangible skills to reduce your environmental footprint. Learn how to make sustainable choices in your daily life, from energy-efficient practices to conscious consumption.

4. Global Perspective: Gain insights into international sustainability initiatives and agreements. Discover how different countries and organizations are working together to address climate and environmental issues.

5. Career Opportunities: Prepare for a career in the growing field of sustainability. Explore job prospects in renewable energy, green technology, conservation, and sustainable business practices.

6. Positive Impact: Understand how individuals and communities can make a real impact on the environment. Explore case studies and success stories from around the world, showcasing the power of collective action.

Join us in the journey towards a greener, more sustainable tomorrow by enrolling in "Renew Sustainability: Nurturing a Greener Tomorrow." To take the first step towards making a positive impact on the environment and securing a sustainable future.
target_audience: This course is for individuals and professionals passionate about sustainability and seeking to integrate it into their work and lives.

courses.description:
This course takes you through key areas of leading and participating in virtual teams, and most crucially, how to adapt your leadership style and methods when your work takes off in the digital space. There is a big difference between face-to-face interaction and online interaction when collaborating in teams. The world has taken our productivity onto digital platforms to a greater extent than ever seen before; Especially in the aftermath of the pandemic, but also with technologies advancing in general.
We look at key areas of virtual teamwork: from planning and scheduling to in-meeting facilitation, documentation & communication platforms, and how to building team spirit when you never see each other in real life. The aim is to give you a toolbox and to avoid the pitfalls of virtual teamwork for you and your team to enhance your efficiency, productivity, and overall experience of virtual work.
Maybe you work in a small team or a big organization? Perhaps roles are clearly defined in your team, or you rather use an entirely horizontal structure? No matter the team, knowing how to facilitate your team’s performance and adaptability to the digital era are skills that any leader or team member can use to their own and their team’s advantage. Welcome to The VALE! Let the digital journey begin…
(PS Especially as this is the first edition of this virtual module, we would appreciate all and any feedback. If you spot any mistakes, or if you in general have any thoughts for how to make it better, please don't hesitate to drop us an email at contact@thevale.eu )

This training course is freely available because its creation was funded through the Erasmus+ Programme of the European Union. Without their support, this would not have been possible.

courses.title: Quickstart Guide to Custom GPT Creation
courses.bio: Unlock AI Magic in One Hour: Custom GPT Development Made Easy and Effective
requirements: Basic Computer Skills: You should be comfortable using a computer and have a basic understanding of software applications.
Internet Access: Access to a stable internet connection is essential for viewing course content and updates.
No Prior AI Knowledge Required: This course is designed for beginners, so no prior knowledge of AI or programming is necessary.
Desire to Learn and Explore: An eagerness to dive into the world of AI and explore its possibilities is the most important prerequisite.
courses.description:
Welcome to our exciting journey into the world of AI, where we'll explore the wonders of ChatGPT and its customizable counterparts! I'm thrilled to guide you through this one-hour crash course, titled Quickstart Guide to Custom GPT Creation.


We live in an era where artificial intelligence is not just a buzzword; it's a reality shaping our daily interactions. At the forefront of this revolution is ChatGPT, a groundbreaking technology that has transformed how we interact with machines. ChatGPT, developed by OpenAI, is a variant of the GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) models. It's designed to understand and generate human-like text, leading to more natural and engaging conversations between humans and AI.


The significance of ChatGPT lies in its versatility. From customer service automation to creative writing, educational tutoring, and even coding assistance, ChatGPT has shown immense potential. It's like having a digital assistant that understands and responds with an almost human touch. This has not only improved efficiency in various sectors but also opened new avenues for innovation.


But what if I told you that the capabilities of ChatGPT could be tailored even more specifically to your needs? This is where the concept of Custom GPT comes into play. Custom GPTs are specialized versions of the original model, fine-tuned to excel in specific tasks or industries. Imagine having a ChatGPT model that understands medical terminology for healthcare applications, or one that can converse in the language of legal jargon for law firms. The possibilities are endless.


In this course, we will delve into the realm of Custom GPTs. You'll learn the basics of how these models work, what makes them so powerful, and most importantly, how you can create a Custom GPT model for your specific needs. Whether you're a business owner, a developer, an educator, or just an AI enthusiast, understanding how to create and use Custom GPT models can be a game-changer.


Throughout this course, we will cover:


1. The fundamentals of Custom GPT and how it works.
2. The process of tailoring a Custom GPT model for specific tasks.
3. Practical examples and use cases of Custom GPTs in various industries.
4. Hands-on demonstrations to guide you in creating your very own Custom GPT model.


Remember, this course is designed to be a concise yet comprehensive introduction. It's perfect for those who are short on time but eager to dive into the world of custom AI models.


By the end of this course, you will not only appreciate the power of ChatGPT but also possess the knowledge and skills to create a Custom GPT model that can revolutionize the way you, your business, or your industry operates.


So, let's embark on this exciting journey together and unlock the potential of customized AI with our "Quickstart Guide to Custom GPT." Are you ready to transform the way you interact with the world of AI? Let's get started!
target_audience: AI Enthusiasts: Individuals keen on exploring the latest in AI technology
Software Developers: Professionals looking to integrate AI into their applications

courses.description:
Course Title- Prevention of Sexual Harassment at Workplace
Sexual harassment of a woman in workplace is of serious concern to humanity on the whole. The victims of sexual harassment face psychological and health effects like stress, depression, anxiety, shame, guilt and so on.
The increase in the number of female employees in any organisation though is a welcome sign for the growth of the organisation and the economy, this can also mean increase in number of sexual harassment cases.
This course is to create awareness amongst all the employees of the Prevention of Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013, from the top executives to the employees down the line .The course discusses in detail about the following:
Below mentioned topics would be covered in POSH module.
What is a sexual harassment? How can it be prevented? Meaning and importance of gender equality at the workplace. Myths and Realities of Sexual Harassment at Workplace. Types of sexual harassment at workplace. Behaviour that constitute sexual harassment at workplace. Types of harassers. Impact of sexual harassment. Dissemination of information and awareness generation. Redress. How to file the complaint? What is the role of the employer? What are the relief measures available to the victim? Penalties and punishments imposed to the harasser and the duties and the responsibilities of the employer.
target_audience: workers /employees in junior,middle and senior levels
Owners/proprietors/Partners/Directors and the Top Management as well

Learning how to set goals is a valuable skill that will take your personal life, business or career to the next level. All your dreams can come true faster if you apply the concepts in this course. courses.title: Environmental Indicators for organizations
courses.bio: Learn how to monitor, analyze and evaluate actions to protect the environment in organizations.
objectives: Design of environmental indicators for organizations
To know the types of environmental indicators for organizations
Basic principles for establishing environmental indicators
To carry out control and follow-up tables of environmental indicators.
requirements: Basic Mathematics
courses.description:
Do you want to help your organization take care of the environment, follow up on the actions implemented and meet environmental objectives on an annual basis? Then this course is perfect for you! Nowadays, companies are increasingly focused on environmental care and seek to implement effective environmental management systems. It is essential to monitor and evaluate the actions implemented, and for this purpose, environmental indicators are the best tool.
In our course you will learn everything you need to know about environmental indicators, from scratch. We will show you how to design and establish indicators step by step, so you can apply them in your organization and obtain tangible results. In addition, we will give you examples of both input and output indicators with formulas that you can use in your organization.
Our eight classes will teach you everything you need to know: introduction, advantages of environmental indicators, types of indicators, principles for designing indicators, indicators according to ISO 14031, environmental performance indicators, environmental management indicators and environmental status indicators.
Using environmental indicators will allow you to identify deviations, weak points in production processes, make comparisons with other sectors, monitor, analyze and evaluate actions to protect the environment, which will allow you to make better decisions.
Don't think twice and join our course! Sign up now and become an expert in environmental
target_audience: Environmental engineers, environmental managers, environmental technicians, business people or professionals who want to measure the environmental performance of an organization.

courses.title: AI Tools for Busy Professionals: Research
courses.bio: Master AI-powered research
objectives: Formulate research strategies that drive smarter decisions
Apply critical thinking to ask better questions and guide AI tools
Master AI tools like Perplexity and NotebookLM for efficient, accurate research
Create and share impactful, AI-generated research outputs
requirements: This course is beginner-friendly, with no technical experience required—we’ll guide you step by step through how to use AI tools effectively.
courses.description:
In today’s fast-paced work environment, research isn’t just about gathering information—it’s about turning data into clear, actionable insights that support better decisions. This section teaches you how to use AI as a powerful research assistant to save time, increase accuracy, and sharpen your critical thinking.
You’ll begin by learning how to ask the right questions—because great research starts with great prompts. Then, you'll explore the difference between search engines like Google, answer engines like ChatGPT, and hybrid tools like Perplexity, so you can choose the best tool for each research goal.
Next, you’ll master key techniques such as:
Writing effective prompts to gather structured, relevant results.
Using Perplexity AI to summarize information, save collections (Spaces), and publish clean, shareable reports (Pages).
Combining Perplexity with NotebookLM to organize internal documents and extract insights from large files.
You’ll also learn how to spot and avoid AI hallucinations—inaccurate or misleading outputs—and apply fact-checking strategies to ensure your research is trustworthy and reliable.
By the end of this section, you’ll be equipped to:
Conduct faster, more focused research.
Manage sources, citations, and summaries with ease.
Make confident, data-informed decisions—no matter your role.
Whether you're in marketing, HR, operations, or strategy, this section will help you transform the way you learn, analyze, and decide—with AI by your side.
target_audience: This course is designed for professionals, managers, and teams who want to boost their productivity, make smarter decisions, and stay ahead by integrating AI tools into their daily workflow—no technical background required.

courses.description:
Sıfırdan Yapay Zeka Uzmanlığı: ChatGPT, Midjourney, 20+ Araç
Bu kurs ile Yapay Zeka dünyasını keşfetmeye hazır mısınız? ChatGPT, Midjourney, DALL-E, Google Gemini (Bard), Bing AI, Notion ve daha birçok araç ile kendi yapay zeka projelerinizi hayata geçirin ve bu alandaki uzmanlığınızı geliştirin.
Temel Kavramları Öğrenin: Yapay Zeka Konseptlerini Kavrayın; Makine Öğrenmesi, Derin Öğrenme ve Doğal Dil İşleme gibi temel konseptleri öğrenin.
En Popüler Araçlar İle Başlayın: ChatGPT ve Midjourney ile prompt mühendisliği ve görsel yaratıcılığı uygulamalı olarak keşfedin.
Projeler Üzerinde Çalışın: Gerçek zamanlı örnekler ve projeler üzerinde çalışarak, öğrendiklerinizi pratiğe dökün.
Geniş Kapsamlı Kurs İçeriği: Bu kurs, yapay zeka alanındaki temel konseptleri ve önemli araçları ele alıyor. Her bölüm, belirli bir konsepti veya aracı derinlemesine anlayabileceğiniz şekilde tasarlanmıştır. ChatGPT bölümünde, prompt mühendisliği ile çeşitli uygulamaları nasıl gerçekleştireceğinizi öğrenecek, Midjourney bölümünde ise görsel yaratıcılık ve tasarım konseptleri üzerinde duracaksınız.
Pratik Beceriler Edinin: Kurs materyalleri teorik bilgileri ve pratik uygulamaları mükemmel bir şekilde dengeler. Gerçek zamanlı örnekler ve projeler üzerinde çalışarak, bu alandaki becerilerinizi geliştirin ve yeni fikirler üretin.
Kariyerinizi Bir Adım Öteye Taşıyın: Yapay Zeka alanında sağlam bir temel, bir dizi yeni beceri ve güven kazanacak, ve kurs sonunda alacağınız sertifika ile profesyonel gelişiminizi belgeleyebilirsiniz.


Bu kapsamlı kursta, Yapay Zeka'nın çeşitli yönlerini keşfederken, bu alandaki en popüler araçlar ve teknolojiler hakkında değerli bilgiler edinecek, ve gerçek projeler üzerinde çalışarak becerilerinizi pratiğe dökeceksiniz.


Giriş: Kursun genel amacı, içeriği ve arayüzü hakkında bilgi edineceksiniz.
Yapay Zeka Teknolojisini Tanımak: Yapay zeka türleri, machine learning, deep learning, LLM ve doğal dil işleme gibi kavramları öğrenirsiniz.
ChatGPT ile Prompt Mühendisliği: ChatGPT adlı yapay zeka aracını tanıyacak ve prompt mühendisliği yapmayı öğreneceksiniz.
ChatGPT Plus Eklentiler ve Diğer Özellikler: ChatGPT’nin eklentilerini ve diğer özelliklerini keşfedecek ve bunları kullanmayı öğreneceksiniz.
ChatGPT İleri Seviye: Süper prompt'lar, chrome eklentileri, gmail entegrasyonu gibi ChatGPT’nin ileri seviye özelliklerini  kullanmayı öğreneceksiniz.
Microsoft’un Yapay Zekası: Bing AI ile ChatGPT'nin ücretli özelliklerini ücretsiz kullanmaya başlayacaksınız.
Google’daki Her Şeyi Biliyor: Google'a erişimi olan bir yapay zeka düşünün, Google Gemini (Bard)!
Midjourney Temel Düzey: Midjourney adlı yapay zeka aracı ile saniyeler içinde sanat eserleri oluşturacağız.
Midjourney İleri Seviye: Midjourney’nin ileri seviye özellikleri ile uzman düzeyinde görseller üreteceksiniz.
DALL-E: ChatGPT’nin sanatçı versiyonu DALL-E ile artık tasarım işlerinizi yapacak bir yapay zekanız var!
Seslendirme ve Video Yapmak: Sesimizi klonlayacağız, sunuculu videolar yapacağız, video kesitleri oluşturacağız.
Diğer Yapay Zeka (AI) Araçları: Kendi chatbot'umuzu yapacağız, Notion AI kullanacağız, Elon Musk'ın yapay zekası ile muhabbet edeceğiz, sunumlar oluşturacağız.
Başardınız!: Emeğinizi tebrik edeceğiz ve CV'nize eklemeniz için sertifika alabileceksiniz.
target_audience: Yapay zeka araçlarını iş veya kişisel projelerinde etkin bir şekilde kullanmak isteyen profesyoneller, girişimciler ve öğrenciler
ChatGPT, Midjourney ve diğer 20+ yapay zeka araçlarını öğrenerek kariyerlerini veya işlerini bir üst seviyeye taşımak isteyenler
Farklı endüstrilerde yapay zeka uygulamalarının nasıl kullanılabileceğini anlamak ve bu konuda fikir sahibi olmak isteyenler

ChatGPTまたはCopilotまたはGemini利用環境（講座内で手順説明があるので予め作成していなくても始められます）
courses.description:
【追加・更新したコンテンツ】
2025年5月　STEP3  「主要生成AIサービス 基本情報と特徴」に小テストを追加しました
2025年5月　STEP3  「主要生成AIサービス 基本情報と特徴」を更新しました
