2025年3月　STEP2  「画像生成・音楽生成・動画生成AIデモ」をCopilot・Sora・Sunoのデモに更新しました
2024年9月　STEP4  「プロンプトの基礎とよりよい生成結果を得るコツ」を追加しました
2024年9月　STEP3にあった演習を見直し、STEP4  「プロンプト演習」として更新しました
2024年9月　STEP3〜STEP5の構成を見直しました
2024年5月　STEP3  「主要生成AIサービス 基本情報と比較」を更新しました
2024年4月　STEP1 「演習」の内容を更新しました
2024年3月　STEP3 「Copilot (旧Bing Chat)」「Gemini (旧Bard)」使い方・ 最新デモを更新しました
2024年3月　STEP2  「AIを使うリスク」を内容を大幅に見直して更新しました
2024年1月　 STEP3  「主要生成AIサービス 基本情報と比較」を更新、小テストを追加しました


【本講座について】
対話型生成AIを使うことは必須ビジネススキルになる日が近づいています。
技術及びサービスの進化により、AIは技術を持った人だけでなく誰でも使いこなせる環境が整っています。


この講座は極力難しい言葉や専門用語を使わず、AIに触れたことがない人でも分かりやすく、最終的には自分の言葉で人に伝えられるくらい理解しやすいコンテンツになることを心がけました。

前半ではAI時代を生き抜く心構え、中盤ではAI業界や生成AIの仕組みをさくっと知ることができる座学、後半ではChatGPT・Copilot (旧Bing Chat)・Gemini (旧Bard)の対話型生成AIの基本情報・比較・デモ、ビジネスシーンでの実例を紹介します。


2025年5月の最新情報を反映し、最新のGPT-4oの画像生成の活用例も追加しています。


実演するプロンプト（AIへの指示文・依頼文）は一覧化されたものがエクセルでダウンロード可能です。


この講座で一緒にAIリスキリングを始めましょう！
target_audience: AIを使うことに興味がある文系ビジネスパーソン
業務を効率化・高品質化したい社会人
ChatGPTなどの利用経験はあるが期待する回答が得られないと感じている人
AI時代に生き抜けるキャリアを身に着けたい人
全社に生成AIを導入すべきか検討している経営層

courses.title: Zoho Campaigns: Creating and Sending Your First Campaign
courses.bio: A quick and simple guide for creating email campaigns with Zoho Campaigns.
requirements: You should already have a Zoho Campaigns account. If you don’t have an account yet, you can create one for free at zoho.com/campaigns.
Please note your actual Zoho Campaigns screen might look or act a little differently depending on what your account administrator has set up for you.
courses.description:
Zoho Campaigns: Overview and Getting Started is designed for the new Zoho Campaigns user. The course will go through the basic steps of creating an email campaign and highlight key features of Zoho Campaigns to help jump-start the user’s email marketing efforts.
By the end of the course, users will know how to:
Build a mailing list and create an audience for each email campaign.
Design email content, using predesigned templates or importing existing templates.
Schedule and send an email campaign.
Analyze Campaign Reports, using statistics to learn about audience behavior and improve open-rates.
Integrate Zoho Campaigns with Zoho CRM. (Zoho CRM is the lead management app within the Zoho Suite. This integration allows users to quickly and easily send an email campaign to their leads or contacts stored inside Zoho CRM.)
Who should take this course?
People whose company has decided to use Zoho Campaigns for email marketing and need to learn how to use the system.
People who are joining a marketing position in a new company that is using Zoho Campaigns.
Marketers who want to get a better understanding of how to create effective email campaigns.
target_audience: Users who are just getting started with Zoho Campaigns
Marketers who want to begin or improve their email marketing efforts
Entrepreneurs or small business owners/employees who want an introduction to email campaigns
Small businesses that want to nurture their leads and build better customer relationships

courses.title: How to Become a Productivity Master
courses.bio: Strategies and Secrets of the Most Productive People

What do the most successful people do?: Overview: what do the most successful people do?
They focus on attention management, not time management
They're calm under pressure and emotionally self-aware
They know how to say no
They rely on trusted tools and systems
What does productivity really look like?: Case study: a productive vs. an unproductive person
How to win at productivity: 4 key habits
Productivity routines and tools: How to schedule work around your attention and energy levels
Creating your own personal productivity: Overview: Creating your own personal productivity system
Reflect on your past productivity habits
Create an attention and focus management plan
Maintaining long-term productivity: The importance of regular productivity reviews
How to overcome resistance and keep up momentum
Share your productivity plan with your group

requirements: There are no requirements or prerequisites for this course.
courses.description:
If you feel like you’re always busy…
If you’re constantly stressed and overwhelmed, and frustrated that you can’t get a moment to yourself…
Then this will be the most important message you read today.
Because today you’ll learn why you’re not getting the important things done... even when you try following all the productivity advice out there.
And chances are, you’ve tried it all - planners, apps, courses, and more. It just never sticks.
But it’s not you -- it’s these methods that just don’t work.
The industry would have you believe that productivity is a matter of managing your time better. That it’s a matter of getting more done in less time.
That’s simply not true.
So if you’re tired of coming home after a stressful day, only to realize you didn’t get anything important done…
… prepare to be shocked and see the real reason why you’re not getting the results you want with your current productivity tools and methods.


The Biggest Productivity Myth - Exposed!
The biggest myth about productivity that nobody questions is this:
That productivity equals getting more things done in less time.
It’s a big lie. And it’s why so many are still stressed and overwhelmed, despite using the latest calendar, planner, or productivity method.
So if productivity isn’t about time management or getting more things done, what is it?
Here’s the answer from one of the greatest minds on productivity:
“Time management is really a misnomer – the challenge is not to manage time, but to manage ourselves.” – Stephen R. Covey.
In other words, the key to being productive isn’t managing your time better. And it isn’t finding new and creative ways to “get more done” in a shorter period of time.
Instead, it’s about managing you.
The key to being far more productive than you ever thought possible is to manage your energy and attention.
Believe it or not, I found this out when I was nine years old!


It's true. That's when I went to bed early on my own accord and woke up earlier than anyone else at home to spend time studying during weekdays. I had lots of fun in the weekends with friends. As a result, I ended up the top student year after year and earned scholarships that fully paid for my education from high school onwards. I continued to live and work this way throughout my career, spent lots of time with my kids when they were young, hardly worked weekends, and enjoyed work-life balance while being extremely productive at work and in volunteer activities.


So now, I’m on a mission to let you and anyone else know the true path to productivity!
Because it’s a shame that so many are banging their heads against the wall, wondering why they aren’t getting the results they want, despite using the planners, the to-do lists, and more.


In this course…
You’ll discover how to become the kind of person that gets the things that matter, done (all without tons of stress or overwhelm).
You’ll know exactly what it takes for you to be productive (and which habits you need to let go of that are robbing your time).
And you’ll know exactly how to create your own, personalized productivity system that works for you and your personality.


In Productivity Master, you’ll also discover:
● What productivity really is (hint: it's not about being busy or checking off every item on your to-do list!)
● Why managing your time better is not the key to being productive (and what you need to manage instead)
● The four "practices" of highly effective and productive people that will help you stay focused (and how to implement it in your own life)
● How adopting one simple word and saying it more often will help you eliminate stress and get more of what matters done
● The two kinds of tools you need to revolutionize your productivity (and no, you don't need yet another planner!)
● How to structure your days for maximum productivity (and significantly boost your free time!)
● The G.S.R.A. formula for getting the results you want with less time and effort
● How to put your productivity on "autopilot" with a daily routine
● How to properly "schedule your work" so you get it done easily - without willpower or struggle
● How to adopt an "inbox zero" frame of mind so you can reduce stress and overwhelm
● Simple ways to deal with resistance and get things done (even when you don't "feel" like doing them)
● And much more...


When you join How to Become a Productivity Master: Strategies and Secrets of the Most Successful People, you’ll learn the strategies and techniques you’ll need to adopt to achieve anything you want in your life with less time or effort.


What You’ll Get


How to Become a Productivity Master: Strategies and Secrets of the Most Successful People includes a combination of in-depth and detailed instructions and hands-on activities. You’ll develop the productivity skills that will help you achieve the results you want in your life.

In this self-guided course, we’ll cover:
Lesson 1: What Do the Most Successful People Do?
Discover what the most successful people do, and learn what productivity is (and isn’t). This will give you a solid foundation for becoming a productivity master.
Lesson 2: What Does Productivity Really Look Like?
Learn what being productive actually looks like and why being busy all the time and checking everything off your task list is NOT the same as being productive.
Lesson 3: Productivity Routines and Tools
Learn how to establish your own personal productivity routines, so you stay productive without needing to use willpower.
Lesson 4: Creating Your Own Personal Productivity System
Learn how to take everything you’ve learned so far and create your own personal productivity system.
Lesson 5: Maintaining Long-Term Productivity
Now that you have your own system for being productive, you’ll learn how to use different tools to stay on track, troubleshoot any issues, and come up with solutions to address any challenges that come your way.


Each power-packed lesson contains targeted activities to help you apply the concepts to your own life... so you can start getting more of what you want, with less time and effort.
The self-paced course contains everything you need to take your productivity to a whole new level.
target_audience: If you feel like you’re always busy…
If you’re constantly stressed and overwhelmed, and frustrated that you can’t get a moment to yourself…
If you’re tired of coming home after a stressful day, only to realize you didn’t get anything important done…
Then this course is for you!

courses.title: Auxiliar Administrativo | Rotinas de Escritório
courses.bio: O que é PF e PJ? E 5 Ss? E afinal, qual a diferença entre TED e DOC? E quando se faz uma Carta Comercial?
objectives: Conhecimentos básicos para o trabalho na área Administrativa: conceito de Pessoa Física e de Pessoa Jurídica e serviços cartoriais.
Organização do local de trabalho e gerenciamento de atividades: 5Ss, agendas e reuniões.
Correspondência empresarial: ata, atestado, carta comercial e demais documentos.
Serviços bancários: conta corrente e poupança, transferência de valores entre contas, cheque e demais serviços bancários.
requirements: É importante, mas não fundamental, que o aluno tenha conhecimento em programas de edição de textos.
courses.description:
O curso de Auxiliar Administrativo – Rotinas de Escritório visa preencher uma lacuna na qualificação profissional de jovens - que buscam uma formação para o seu primeiro emprego - e adultos - que procuram promoção no local onde atua, recolocação no mercado de trabalho ou novas ideais para implementar no controle e organização de seus pequenos negócios.




Conteúdos estudados
O curso possui ao todo 23 episódios, composto por mais de 25 horas aulas em vídeo, incrementado com 23 roteiros de estudos disponibilizados para download no formato PDF e no formato de artigo, além de questões para revisão. Os assuntos estudados foram divididos em 6 arcos:
Arco I: Postura Profissional - Breve história da profissão e a evolução dela no Brasil; Características técnicas e comportamentais desejados para o profissional da área; A importância do trabalho em equipe; Diferença entre chefe e líder; Ética profissional.
Esse primeiro arco é introdutório, com o objetivo de apresentar ao aluno os conceitos mais fundamentais para quem irá atuar. A importância desse arco se dá pela necessidade de ter uma boa postura no trabalho, ainda mais quando se almeja um reconhecimento.


Arco II: Início do Expediente - Conceito de Pessoa Física e de Pessoa Jurídica; Documentação da Pessoa Física (Certidão de Nascimento, CPF, Carteira de identidade; CTPS e outros); Documentação da Pessoa Jurídica (contrato social, CNPJ, Inscrição Estadual e Alvará); Serviços de cartórios (tabelionatos e registros civis).
O segundo arco mira na importância do profissional da área em saber identificar e buscar os dados nos documentos das pessoas físicas e jurídicas quando da necessidade de preenchimento de cadastros e formulários.


Arco III: Organização - Programa de Qualidade 5 S's; Trabalho com agendas; Gerenciamento de tarefas; Reuniões (pauta de reunião e organização de reuniões); Noções de arquivamento.
Sabemos que organização é uma característica necessária do profissional e o terceiro arco trabalha nesse ponto, apresentando uma poderosa ferramenta que ajuda nesse quesito. Gerenciar o seu tempo e as suas tarefas é fundamental para um profissional que trabalha praticamente de forma "autônoma", mas com supervisão. Aquele que tem domínio sobre os seus compromissos é respeitado por seus pares!


Arco IV: Correspondência Empresarial - Processo de comunicação; Comunicação empresarial; Correspondência e envelopamento; E-mail; Elaboração de documentos diversos (ata, atestado, declaração, procuração, circular, memorando, carta comercial, ofício, requerimento, abaixo assinado, nota promissória e recibo).
A necessidade da comunicação é de conhecimento de todos, então trabalhar esse ponto não é só importante como também crucial na vida de qualquer organização. Neste arco iremos ver dicas para montar um simples e-mail até documentos mais tradicionais, como a ata e a carta comercial.


Arco V: Atendimento - Importância do atendimento; Tipos de clientes; Atendimento ao telefone; Tabela de horários para ligações; Ligações telefônicas (local, DDD e DDI); Dicas para atendimento via chat.
O atendimento faz parte de nossas relações sociais, pois se não estamos atendente um cliente externo, estamos atendendo um colega de trabalho ou até mesmo amigos, familiares e colegas de escola. Esse arco tem o objetivo de auxiliar nesse ponto!


Arco VI: Conhecimentos Básicos Bancários - Tipos de contas bancárias (conta corrente e conta poupança); Noções de aplicações em CDB e Tesouro Direto; Cartões de débito e de crédito; Transferências de valores (DOC, TED e PIX); Preenchimento de cheques; Formas de emissão de cheques; Impacto da inflação no dia-a-dia; Dólar; Financiamentos e empréstimos bancários.
É comum os auxiliares administrativos desempenhares serviços bancários, como pagamento de contas. No entanto, por mais que tais serviços estejam presentes em nossa vida, é fundamental conhecer melhor para que possamos escolher qual destes [serviços] melhor nos atende.


Os recursos do curso
Para auxiliar nos estudos, eu elaborei um material de leitura complementar no formato PDF, que chamo de Roteiro de Estudo, sob medida para cada aula. A leitura desse material irá reforçar tudo o que é explicado em vídeo e, por este motivo, é um poderoso material de suporte na aprendizagem! Os slides que são utilizados em aula também ficam disponíveis para o seu acesso e estão no formato PDF! Assim, é muito material que vai te ajudar nos seus estudos! Utilize-os!
Ao final de cada arco eu preparei uns questionários - todos com gabaritos disponíveis para consulta ao final do curso - para que tu possas revisar os conteúdos, melhorando o aprendizado desses assuntos tão importantes para o ambiente administrativo.
Também há testes com questões de múltiplas escolhas ao final de cada unidade, chamadas de ATOL (Atividades on-line)! Elas são teóricas, desafiadoras e várias delas tentam simular situações do cotidiano do trabalho.


Para quem é esse curso?
Se você está saindo do Ensino Médio ou está buscando informações importantes para o seu primeiro emprego, esse curso é ideal para ti! Está em busca de uma mudança na carreira? Sinta-se convidado a estudar comigo! Ah, tu já trabalhas nessa área? Não tem problema, pois aqui será um ambiente para reforçar os seus conhecimentos e (por que não?) agregar mais informações!


Puxem a cadeira, um café e um material de anotação: é hora de conhecer um pouco sobre o trabalho na área administrativa!
Bons estudos!
target_audience: Jovens que buscam formação para o seu primeiro emprego.
Adultos que buscam qualificação para promoção ou mudança de profissão.
Pequenos microempreendedores individuais que desejam adquirir conhecimentos básicos para organização de seu trabalho.

courses.title: How to write effective business emails
courses.bio: Learn nitty-gritty of business email writing and be confident with your email communication
requirements: Intermediate level proficiency in English
courses.description:
This course is aimed at imparting all business email writing related skills, right from understanding etiquettes of using emails as a mode of communication to formatting properly to make a good presentation. I have provided the structure of business emails, so that a novice also can understand how to write business emails. This course included style and tone of formal and semi formal business emails, methods of effective subject line writing, use of proper salutation and sign-off. It will go further deep into discussing different opening statements, body paragraphs and other important expressions apt for different business situations. In other words, this course will try to deal with all those points which are crucial for a business email writing.
This course is for all professionals who need to write emails as a part of their job. So from C -level executives to interns everyone will find it helpful. Even job seekers will also be benefited as they also need to use emails for applying for jobs or communicating with prospective employers. Although this course is not aimed for email marketers, as no marketing methods discussed here, still a learner of email marketing will find it helpful to understand structure, important expressions and style and tone of a business email.
target_audience: Professionals, Interns, Job Seekers and anyone who needs write emails for their profession

courses.title: 時間管理マスターコース：生産性を上げると、仕事も人生も豊かになる！
courses.bio: 官庁・大手企業をはじめ、リーダー・経営者の方々にも伝授してきた手法です。効率的・効果的な時間の使い方を体系的に学ぶことで、あなたの働き方とライフスタイルに変化を与えます。「Work Smarter！」を目指しませんか？
objectives: 時間にコントロールされるのではなく、選択する側になれる
自分の軸ができ、論理的な決断ができるようになる
生産性が上がり、売り上げアップにつながる
コミュニケーションがスムーズにいくようになる
ストレスが減り、心に余裕がうまれる

はじめに: コースをはじめる前に
時間管理を成功させる基本の３ステップ: 時間管理を進める前に・・・
時間管理の目的と自分を知ろう！: 自分の現在位置と未来を知るためのワーク
時間管理をすることで達成したい事
時間管理を成功させる5つの要素: そもそも時間管理とは？
日本人が陥りがちなワナ１
時間管理の肝をマスターする: タスクのブレークダウン
ストレスの原因はこれ！
大統領と同じやり方をマスターする: あなたの時給はいくら？
日本人が陥りがちなワナ２
日本初、世界で人気の概念をマスターする: 「整理整頓・見える化」のワーク１
「整理整頓・見える化」のワーク２

エネルギーサイクルをマスターする: エネルギーサイクルとは？
自分に合った時間の使い方を見つける
時間泥棒との戦い方をマスターする: 邪魔により中断されないための７つの戦略 Step1
邪魔により中断されないための７つの戦略 Step2
賢いマルチタスクのやり方
様々なフレームワークをマスターする: ポモドーロ・テクニック
良い仕事をするための黄金バランス
アイビー・リー・メソッド
ウォーレン・バフェット・メソッド

requirements: 意欲がある方ならどなたでも大歓迎です！
初心者向け
courses.description:
このコースは、私がスウェーデンで経験した新しい働き方、時間の使い方、そして考え方をベースにしています。

日本では「働き方改革」という言葉が出回っていますが、政府から言われたから進めているというのでは、成果は出にくいものです。 そしてそのような場合は、往々にしてしわ寄せが個人に行ってしまいます。また単に「残業を減らす」という取り組みだけでは、「生産性をあげる」というビジネスの成果につながってきません。

ですから、このコースでは単にテクニックを学ぶのではなく、基本となるマインドセットの部分にも力を入れて作成しました。

実は、私は以前は相当なワークホリックでした。 ですが、本社スウェーデンで働く機会を得たことで、目からうろこの連続となるようなことを経験。そして軽いカルチャーショックを受けたことで、働き方や生き方について考えるようになりました。

何しろ、スウェーデンは人口が約1000万人と少人数ながら、一人当たりのGDP・GNIは日本より高く、国際競争力があります。それはなぜかを考えた時に、一つは生産性をあげる時間の使い方をしているということに気づきました。彼らは共働きの家庭が多いので、必然的に効率的・効果的な時間の使い方をしないと上手くいかない、ということも根底にあるかもしれません。

また、今は昔と違って、携帯電話やインターネットは当たり前の世の中です。そうすると、四六時中時間に追い回されている気分になりますが、なんとかそんな状況から解放されたいと思ってしまいますよね。

ですからこのコースでは、どうしたらもっと時間をうまく使えるようになるのか、とお悩みのあなたに役立つような内容をまとめています。

ただし、時間管理はあなたの状況によって、やり方が変わってきます。
ですから、どのやり方が今のあなたにあっているかを見極めてお使いいただけると、より成果が出やすいのではないかと思います。

そのためにいろいろなテクニックもお伝えしていますし、復習できるようにテキストもPDFで用意しました。
宜しければ、ダウンロードしてお役立てくださいね。

そして、あなたの人生がハッピーなものになることを応援しています！
target_audience: とにかく忙しくて時間が足りないと感じている方
時間をもっとうまく使えるようになりたいと思っている方
今までいろいろ試してみたが、上手くいかなかった方
豊かな働き方とライフスタイルを望んでいる方

courses.title: AI Consulting Mastery: Strategies for Modern Consultants
courses.bio: Harness AI tools, market analysis, client strategies, and ethical practices to excel in consulting.

Introduction to AI in Consulting: Introduction to ChatGPT and its Capabilities
AI Tools for Consultants: Using AI to Increase Workplace Efficiency
AI in Market Analysis and Research: Analyzing the Plant-Based Meat Market with ChatGPT
Humata - Identifying Consumer Sentiment Towards Electric Vehicles

requirements: Basic understanding of consulting principles.
Access to a computer and internet connection.
Familiarity with digital communication tools.
Willingness to learn AI applications in consulting.
No prior AI experience required.
Interest in enhancing consulting strategies with AI.
Basic knowledge of market analysis concepts.
Commitment to completing hands-on projects.
Curiosity about AI ethics and data privacy.
Desire to improve client engagement with AI.
courses.description:
Welcome to "AI Consulting Mastery: Strategies for Modern Consultants," your comprehensive guide to navigating the evolving landscape of consulting with the power of artificial intelligence. In today’s technology-driven world, AI is transforming how consultants deliver value, streamline operations, and drive client success. This course is meticulously designed for aspiring and seasoned consultants, business advisors, and professionals eager to leverage AI to enhance their consulting practices.
Throughout this course, you will delve into the foundational concepts of AI in consulting, starting with an introduction to ChatGPT and its versatile capabilities. Learn how self-guided learning with AI can elevate your consulting strategies, enabling you to provide more insightful and data-driven advice to your clients. Explore a range of AI tools tailored for consultants, mastering their use to increase workplace efficiency and deliver superior results.
Discover how to effectively advise clients on AI adoption by conducting thorough client assessments and developing transformation strategies that align with their business goals. Through real-world case studies, gain valuable insights into successful AI implementations in various consulting scenarios, enhancing your ability to replicate these successes with your clients.
Enhance your market analysis and research capabilities with AI-driven tools like Humata and Feedly, enabling you to provide comprehensive and accurate market insights. Learn to personalize your consulting services at scale, embracing the age of hyper-personalization to meet each client's unique needs. courses.description:
CHATGPT MASTERCLASS e Inteligência Artificial IA. Domine a IA mais poderosa do Mundo! Transforme a sua vida com o Curso Masterclass ChatGPT!
Introdução breve:
Você já sonhou em ter uma IA poderosa ao seu lado, pronta para ajudá-lo a alcançar seus objetivos, seja para melhorar sua produtividade, ampliar suas habilidades de marketing, criar conteúdo ou simplesmente organizar a sua vida diária? O Curso Masterclass ChatGPT foi desenvolvido para fazer exatamente isso. Este curso fornece a você uma compreensão profunda do ChatGPT e o ensina a aproveitar ao máximo esta ferramenta extraordinária.


Características principais e benefícios do curso:
Domine o Futuro do Trabalho: Com o nosso curso abrangente, você aprenderá a dominar o ChatGPT, uma ferramenta de IA avançada que está reformulando o mundo do trabalho e da produtividade. Este é o conhecimento que coloca você à frente em sua carreira ou negócio.
Potencialize a sua Criatividade: Aprenda a utilizar o ChatGPT como um recurso inesgotável de ideias e inspiração para conteúdo, criando textos, blogs, scripts de vídeo e muito mais com facilidade e eficácia incomparáveis.
Maximize o Impacto do Seu Marketing: Descubra como usar o ChatGPT para criar campanhas de marketing impactantes, gerar títulos cativantes, escrever e-mails otimizados e desenvolver estratégias de publicidade avançadas.
Revolucione a Sua Produtividade: Utilize o ChatGPT para otimizar sua organização pessoal e profissional, desde a programação de tarefas até a gestão eficaz de projetos.
Aprenda no Seu Ritmo, no Seu Tempo: O curso é 100% online e flexível, permitindo que você aprenda a dominar o ChatGPT no seu próprio ritmo, de qualquer lugar do mundo.
Comunidade Exclusiva de Aprendizado: Ao se inscrever, você se torna parte de uma comunidade vibrante e engajada de alunos, com a oportunidade de aprender com os outros, compartilhar suas experiências e expandir sua rede.
Não perca esta oportunidade única de dominar o ChatGPT e transformar a sua vida. Clique no botão abaixo para se inscrever no Curso Masterclass ChatGPT agora mesmo e comece a sua jornada rumo ao sucesso!

courses.title: 『ロジカルシンキング＆ライティング基礎編』AIが文章を書くなら人間は意味を書くことで差をつけろ！
courses.bio: AIが知性の代行者となる時代、人間に残された知的領域—それは「問いを立て、構造化し、伝える」力。本講座は原点に立ち戻り「書くこと＝考えること」として再構築。論理的で構造的でそして深く伝わる思考と言葉の習慣を今こそ鍛え上げる！
objectives: あらゆる業務の土台となる、論理性と説得性を重視した思考と文書作成能力の向上方法を体系的に学べます。
より具体的には、論理的であるための具体的な要件は何か、どうすれば論理的になれるのか。
明瞭なメッセージを表するにはどうすれば良いのか、いかなるパラメーターを操ると良いのか。
多様なフォーマットに対応できる文書の設計図をいかに作るか。
相手の積極的な傾聴を促すにはどうしたら良いのか。
文書全体の流れ、つまりストーリーの構造をどう捉えたら良いのか。
さらに、このような学びの中で、数多くの思考と表現の「要素技術」を身に付けます。
要素技術には、結論づけ、推論、要約化、抽象化、具体化、ピラミッッド構造、MECE（もれなくダブりなく）、論理接続等。

イントロダクション: 本講座の期待効果と難易度
テキストダウンロードのおすすめ
はじめに: 本講座の経営戦略上の位置づけとコミュニケーションの目的
第一章：論理的であること: 良いビジネスコミュニケーションは、聞き手に行動を促す
実践的な論理性の基本は主張した上で根拠を述べるという構造にある
説得力を増すには聞き手の立場から己の論理展開を見直す姿勢が大切
第二章：明瞭表現の要素: 文書の作成とは部品としてのメッセージを組み合わせる作業
メッセージには記述、評価、規範の三種類がある1
メッセージには記述、評価、規範の三種類がある2
発信者側、発信情報、受信者側の３段階でメッセージの種類を考えるとよい
演習：メッセージの種類
演習解説：メッセージの種類
主語、接続語、抽象度の操作によって明瞭表現を追求できる
主語をしっかりと記載する。
曖昧接続詞を排除した上で、適切な論理接続詞を用いる
演習課題：景気の底離れ
演習解説：景気の底離れ
抽象表現は相手に具体的解釈を委ねるので要注意
演解説：抽象表現の具体化
第三章：ピラミッド型設計図: メッセージをまとめるには、ピラミッド構造が便利
メッセージの絞り込みには、ボトムアップ的なテーマ別のグループ化が有効
トップダウン法を用いて、メッセージを考える手法も効果的
ミーシー的思考を応用した分析ツールは数多くある

requirements: 表面的なテクニックに留まらず深く学びたいという意欲のある方
courses.description:
本講座の目的は、あらゆる仕事の基礎となる論理的思考と表現技術に磨きをかけるところにあります。思考と表現の品質を向上するための講座です。 そもそも、ビジネスパーソンにとって「書くこと」は業務遂行において不可欠な作業です。自分ひとりで全てをこなすのは不可能です。周りとの協業を目指すビジネスコミュニケーションの目的は、こちらの意図を読み手（AIを含む！）に理解してもらった上で、最終で的に読み手に行動を促すところにあります。
そこでは、書き手と読み手の暗黙の前提を意識しながら、諸々の考えを論理的に構築する技術と、読み手に配慮した理解しやすい表現技術が求められます。 これらは、学校ではなかなか教えてもらえない、また、日々の業務経験だけからは習得し辛い、体系的な学習を必要とする高度な技術です。
本講座は、その原型を1993年に遡るロジカル/クリティカル・シンキング系講座の草分け的講座です。長年、数多くの一流企業の人材育成に導入され続けている高杉事務所の研修プログラムをオンライン動画フォーマットに落とし込みました。シンキングとライティングを合わせて学習してゆくユニークな講座です。
レクチャーに並行して、本講座には多くの演習が設けられています。演習解説のビデオを見る前にぜひチャレンジしてください。さらなるな内容の理解と沢山の気付きを得ることができます。
それでは、本講座において論理性と説得性に裏付けられた思考力と文章表現のスキルを身につけてください。必ずや皆さんの業務効率の向上に役立つと信じてます。
target_audience: 業務効率を上げたいと思っている新社会人及び業務経験を有する営業系、技術系、事務系など幅広い層。グローバル業務従事者にも有益

courses.title: Clear ISO-9001 Lead Auditor Exam easily with real exam Qs
courses.bio: High chances of these questions appearing in the actual exam. CQI-IRCA and PECB standards of certification questions
courses.description:
Practice Test Details:


- Format: Multiple-choice questions, scenario-based questions, and possibly case studies
- Duration: Typically 2-3 hours, depending on the provider
- Content: Covers the ISO 9001 standard, audit principles, and auditing techniques
- Level of Difficulty: Similar to the actual certification exam


What to Expect:


- Questions that test your understanding of the standard's requirements and audit principles
- Scenarios that simulate real-world auditing situations
- Opportunities to demonstrate your knowledge and skills in:
- Interpreting the standard's requirements
- Planning and conducting audits
- Evaluating conformity and nonconformity
- Reporting audit findings and following up on corrective actions


Benefits:


- Assess your knowledge and skills in preparation for the actual certification exam
- Identify areas for improvement and focus your studying
- Build confidence in your ability to apply the standard and audit principles
- Get familiar with the exam format and question types


Tips for Success:


- Review the ISO 9001 standard and audit principles thoroughly
- Practice with sample questions and scenarios
- Manage your time effectively during the practice test
- Analyze your results and focus on areas for improvement


By taking this practice test, you'll be well-prepared for the actual certification exam and can demonstrate your expertise as an ISO 9001 Lead Auditor. As per CQI-IRCA and PECB certification standards, these questions are curated.
target_audience: Experienced Professionals

AI Tools Mastery: ChatGPT, Zapier & More for Productivity
COURSE OVERVIEW
Discover how to master the world’s most powerful AI tools in one comprehensive program. Learn ChatGPT, Zapier, Gemini, Claude AI, Perplexity, DeepSeek, Grok, DALL·E, InVideo AI, Canva AI, and GitHub Copilot—and gain the skills to automate, create, and innovate efficiently.
This course is designed for entrepreneurs, creators, marketers, and developers who want hands-on mastery and real-world results.

WHO THIS COURSE IS FOR
Entrepreneurs & business owners ready to harness AI for growth
Digital marketers & content creators seeking efficient, top-tier output

Anyone determined to master the AI revolution
WHY THIS COURSE IS DIFFERENT

TAKE ACTION NOW
Enroll today and transform your productivity, creativity, and workflow with AI Tools Mastery: ChatGPT, Zapier & More for Productivity.

courses.description:
Attending meetings is part of the daily routine of many professionals.
Have you asked how you can be more productive and effective in your meetings?
Having the right processes to run your meetings is the key component to not only saving time but also achieving your goals faster.
In this course, we are going to cover processes, templates, and routines to help you to run meetings like a pro using a great tool called Evernote.
I'll demonstrate efficient workflows and templates to help you to start planning your meetings with more organization.
Your team will enjoy your level of organization and professionalism.
You will learn the routines and the important aspects before the meeting (planning), during the meeting (executing), and post-meeting (follow-up). I'll also demonstrate workflows for each stage including the structure you need to configure on your Evernote using tags and notebooks.
Evernote is an important part of the game, it will help you to manage all aspects including your Calendar appointments, To-do's, and Data Management in an effective way.
No more time wasting searching for documents, meeting notes, and files.
Focus on the most important aspects of your routine and run your workflows in an organized way.
I'm really excited to have you here, and I see you inside!

requirements: This course is beginner-friendly
WPS Office Software: Learners will need to install WPS Office on their computer. The free version is sufficient for the course.
WPS Office is available for Windows, macOS. Make sure you have the latest version of WPS Office installed.

This course is designed to be beginner-friendly, and no prior experience with WPS Office or similar software is required. The goal is to make the learning process as simple as possible while ensuring a solid understanding of the essential features and functionalities of WPS Office Writer.
courses.description:
Course Description:
Do you feel overwhelmed trying to navigate WPS Office Writer? You’re not alone! Many beginners struggle to figure out where to start, while professionals and students often waste time searching for the right tools. Formatting issues, unclear tabs, and underused features can make working on documents frustrating and time-consuming.
This course is here to change all that. Whether you’re drafting essays, creating business reports, or preparing important documents, this course will guide you step-by-step through every feature of WPS Writer. Designed for beginners, students, and professionals, we’ll break down each tab to help you master the tools you need to succeed.
Each lesson is short, focused, and easy to follow. Here’s what you’ll learn:
Home Tab: Say goodbye to messy documents—learn how to format text, align paragraphs, and make your work look professional.
Insert Tab: No more struggling to add tables, charts, or images—make your documents visually impressive with ease.
Layout Tab: Get rid of page setup headaches by learning how to manage margins, columns, and page breaks perfectly.
Review Tab: Collaborate effortlessly with tools like comments, track changes, and document protection.
View Tab: Customize your workspace and discover tricks to improve focus and efficiency.
By the end of this course, you’ll go from feeling frustrated to feeling confident. You’ll save time, work smarter, and create polished documents that stand out. Let’s transform your WPS Writer experience together—enroll now!
target_audience: This WPS Office Writer course is perfect for:   (1.) Beginners to Word Processing   If you're new to word processing software and want to learn how to create, edit, and format documents effectively, this course will guide you step-by-step through WPS Office Writer. It’s designed for those who may have little or no experience with word processors.    (2.) Students and Professionals    Whether you're a student writing essays or reports, or a professional preparing documents for work, this course will provide you with the skills to use WPS Office Writer efficiently. It covers everything from basic text formatting to more advanced document features.     (3. ) Microsoft Word Users Switching to WPS Office    If you’re accustomed to using Microsoft Word but are transitioning to WPS Office Writer, this course will help you quickly adapt by showing you the equivalent features and tools in WPS Office.     (4.)  Anyone Looking to Improve Document Creation Skills    If you’re looking to boost your document creation skills for personal, academic, or professional use, this course is an ideal way to enhance your knowledge and productivity using WPS Office Writer.  This course is perfect for anyone who needs to create, format, or edit documents efficiently, and it caters to learners of all experience levels!

courses.description:
Remote work is a working style that allows professionals to work outside of a traditional office environment. It is also called as Working From Home.
In this course, you will learn about Remote Working, how it's different from office working, and how it helps to work with global teams. During Remote working various challenges are faced by workers like Connecting with peers, Collaborating with Team Members,  Accounting of tasks, Troubleshooting of IT issue, File Sharing, etc.
By completing this course you will get smart solutions for all these problems.
You will also get to know about some Best Practices which will help you to become a Smart Remote Worker.
target_audience: Anyone who is new to Remote working
Anyone who is already performing Remote Working

objectives: Become a top-1% thought leader in your industry by following the simple strategy outlined in this course
Learn what kind of content you need to create, and how to outsource it so it doesn't take much of your time
Learn to create a book quickly to solidify your thought leader standing by outsourcing it or with AI

Introduction and welcome: Difference between a thought leader and an influencer

requirements: There are no prerequisites for this course, just a love for learning and a desire to become a thought leader.
courses.description:
Do you dream of being a recognized authority in your field? Are you passionate about sharing your expertise and building a loyal audience in your niche? This course is your ultimate guide to becoming a sought-after influencer and thought leader. Whether you’re an entrepreneur, professional, or creative, this course equips you with the strategies, tools, and insights needed to stand out in today’s competitive digital landscape.
What You’ll Learn:


Thought Leadership Strategies
Learn what it takes to position yourself as an authority in your niche. This module dives deep into personal branding, audience engagement, and effective storytelling to establish your expertise and gain the trust of your followers. Discover how to identify your unique voice, craft your value proposition, and create a lasting impact in your community.
Writing a Book to Build Authority
A book can be your most powerful tool for gaining credibility and expanding your reach. In this section, you’ll learn how to plan, write, and publish a book that positions you as a thought leader. From brainstorming your topic to creating an outline, mastering the writing process, and exploring publishing options, we’ll guide you every step of the way.
Content Creation Across Platforms
Becoming an influencer isn’t just about what you know—it’s about how you share it. Explore strategies for creating compelling social media posts, engaging videos, and impactful podcasts. Learn how to tailor content for different platforms, grow your audience organically, and stay consistent with your messaging. Whether you’re posting on Instagram, YouTube, or Spotify, this module ensures you’ll connect with your audience and build a thriving online presence.
Why Take This Course?


Proven Frameworks: Our step-by-step methods are designed to help you implement strategies with ease and confidence.
Actionable Tips: Walk away with a clear action plan for each stage of your influencer journey.
Comprehensive Training: From content creation to self-publishing, this course covers every essential element to help you succeed.
Adaptable for Any Niche: Whether your passion is fitness, finance, art, or tech, this course is tailored to suit influencers in any industry.
Who This Course is For:


Aspiring influencers eager to make their mark in a specific niche.
Professionals and entrepreneurs looking to grow their personal brands.
Creators who want to develop high-quality, impactful content.
Thought leaders aiming to expand their reach and influence through books and digital media.
What You’ll Gain:


Confidence in your ability to inspire, educate, and lead.
A clear roadmap for writing and publishing a book to establish your authority.
Skills to create and distribute engaging multimedia content across multiple platforms.
Insights into building an authentic and loyal audience.
By the end of this course, you’ll have the tools, strategies, and confidence to become a trusted voice in your niche, amplify your message, and grow your influence. Start your journey today—your audience is waiting!
target_audience: Entrepreneurs who want to grow on social media, and build an authoritative brand
Professionals who want to grow their career and a personal brand
Aspiring digital marketers
People who want to create a personal brand

requirements: Ein kostenloser ChatGPT Account
courses.description:
ChatGPT ist das weltweit beliebteste KI-Tool und bietet schier endlose Möglichkeiten für den Einsatz im Alltag. In diesem Kurs werden wir Dir ausführlich erklären, was ChatGPT eigentlich ist, welche Technologie dahintersteckt und was damit alles möglich ist. Sobald Du das theoretische Wissen verinnerlicht hast, werden wir direkt in die Praxis übergehen und die Verwendung von ChatGPT erlernen.
Dazu werden wir einige Anwendungen gemeinsam machen, unter anderem:


Text erstellen und bearbeiten
Zusammenfassen von Inhalten
Bewerbungsschreiben verfassen
ChatGPT als Bewerbungscoach
ChatGPT als Nachhilfelehrer
Interaktives Lernen mit ChatGPT
Multiple Choice Quiz mit ChatGPT
Inhaltserstellung für Social Media
Spannende Plugins für ChatGPT


Bei allen Prompts - so heißen die Eingaben, die wir für Chatbots nutzen - erklären wir Dir genau, warum wir diese so formulieren, was wichtig ist und wie man die bestmöglichen Ergebnisse erzielen kann.


Zusätzlich erhältst Du ein PDF, das alle im Kurs verwendeten Prompts enthält.


Auch für User mit einem Plus-Account – oder die, die einfach interessiert, was damit möglich ist - haben wir einen Abschnitt im Kurs. Dort zeigen wir einige der Features, für die man aktuell zahlen muss in der Praxis, was auch einen super Einblick ermöglicht, wenn man sich aktuell noch nicht ganz entscheiden kann, ob es einem das wert ist.
Du kannst Dir gerne auch noch weitere Vorschauvideos ansehen, um Dich von der Qualität des Kurses zu überzeugen.
Wir freuen uns darauf, Dich gleich im Kurs wiederzusehen und Dir beizubringen, wie Du Künstliche Intelligenz in Deinen Alltag integrieren kannst.
target_audience: Einsteigerinnen und Einsteiger im KI Bereich
Alle, die den Umgang mit KI lernen möchten
Alle, die mehr über ChatGPT lernen möchten
Alle, die ChatGPT bei der Arbeit nutzen möchten

courses.title: Trello Mastery: Organize Projects & Tasks with AI
courses.bio: Learn Trello basics, AI integrations, team workflows & automation to organize tasks, boost productivity & save time.

AI with Trello: Building a WIP Board with AI Tools
Enhancing Productivity with Trello Backgrounds and Themes
Enhancing Task Organization with Labels, Stickers, and Covers

requirements: No prior Trello or project management experience is needed
Access to a computer or mobile device with internet to create and explore your Trello account.
A willingness to organize your work better and explore the power of AI tools for productivity.
courses.description:
Are you ready to take control of your tasks, projects, and workflows with a powerful yet easy-to-use tool? Whether you're a student, freelancer, solopreneur, or part of a growing team—this course will help you master Trello and unlock its full potential by integrating it with the power of AI tools like ChatGPT and Zapier.
This hands-on course is designed for complete beginners with zero experience in project management or Trello. We’ll start from scratch, walk you through Trello’s interface, show you how to create boards, lists, and cards—and then level up with automation, customization, and productivity hacks.
But we don’t stop at the basics. You’ll also explore how to integrate AI into your Trello boards to automate repetitive tasks, manage workload limits (WIP), collaborate with your team, and even use Trello for content planning, goal tracking, or business management.
By the end of this course, you’ll not only feel confident using Trello—you’ll be using it like a pro-level productivity system tailored to your needs.
Join now to get lifetime access, downloadable templates, and practical examples that you can start using immediately.
See you inside on your journey to master trello!
Let’s make your work simpler, faster, and smarter—with Trello + AI.
target_audience: Beginners who want to get started with Trello and organize their tasks, goals, or projects in a simple and visual way.
Students and professionals looking to boost their productivity using Trello and AI tools like ChatGPT or Zapier.
Freelancers and solopreneurs who need a free, powerful tool to manage client projects, content calendars, or to-do lists.
Remote teams or startup founders who want to collaborate better and streamline communication using Trello boards.
Creatives, marketers, and content creators who need a flexible planning tool for campaigns, posts, or workflows.
Anyone curious about combining project management with AI to automate work and stay focused on what matters most.
